courses.title: Hydrant system-Basics
courses.bio: Standpipe system & Design
requirements: Student must have basic knowledge of fluid mechanics
courses.description:
Hello!
Welcome to this course!!
Being in the MEP industry, I found many of the personal do not have proper knowledge of the fire hydrant system and their constraints set by the international codes. Hence, I decided to share my knowledge through the course making on this particular topic covering all the important concepts on very minimal price. I used to update and add the courses every week for the learners convenience and understanding.
This course is designed in such a way that everyone can understand the concepts easily. I tried to give live example with the help of images to make it easy to understand. However, if you have any doubts, you can send me question in group chat, I will answer your question as soon as possible.
First section of the course contains basic information about the component of wet-riser system like hydrant valve , hose, pipes pumps etc. All the required specifications & operational procedures has been discussing in the lectures. Second section contains design concepts and suggested formulas by NFPA 14.


I hope that you would have a lot of question in your mind before taking the course but I am sure that those all will be answered after completing the course.


Thanks & Regards
Kundan Kumar


See you inside !!

courses.title: Rhino 3D for Architects from Scratch
courses.bio: Rhino Full Course from Zero to Hero Aimed for Architecture Students
objectives: 3D Modeling for Architecture from Scratch
Organic and Geometrical Architectural Modeling
Efficient Modeling Workflow
Architectural Representation Strategies
Workflow between Rhino and other Architectural Softwares
Topography Creation of any Region
Simple to do Parametric Designs
requirements: Rhinoceros 6 or 7 Installed in your PC
No prior experience of the software required
courses.description:
In this course aimed for architecture students you will not only learn the basics of Rhinoceros, but also acquire the necessary skills to be able to model complex forms efficiently. You will come by and gain an understanding of strategies that I have developed with more than 10 years of experience that will allow you to create high end architectural diagrams of your concept, site analysis and even it's structure. By the the end of the lectures you will be able to create any architectural design effortlessly and represent it in an appropriate manner.
The course is designed to start us off with the software of Rhinoceros from scratch, learning the most valuable and efficient ways for architects to start modeling geometrical forms. In a second stage the lectures will take you into the understanding on how to produce organic designs, this being a subject that not many know how to accomplish in the field of architecture.Â  On a third stage we will look into complementing our designs with structure and window frames with efficient methods. Fourth stage consists on the architectural representation through diagrams that we can initialy produce in Rhino and then retouch them in a bonus lesson of Adobe Illustrator.
target_audience: Beginners who want to start or step up with 3d modeling for architecture and design

courses.title: Passive Solar Design Series - Shading Mask
courses.bio: Get started with this powerful and simple tool to design climate responsive buildings (approved for 1 GBCI CE hour)
objectives: Define a shading mask
Make your own shading mask kit
Create shading mask profiles for different objects
Understand application of shading masks in building design

Shading Mask: module 1: What is a shading mask

requirements: This is a beginner level course. You do not need to have prior knowledge passive solar design concepts.
Familiarity with building design/building construction will be an advantage
courses.description:
The first step in passive solar design process is to determine solar access for a building and site. This will help designers determine strategies to control daylight and heat gain. Shading mask diagrams are very resourceful tools to determine solar access. This course will equip you to read and create shading masks so that you can use them in your design process.
A shading mask is a representation of the sky as viewed from a reference point, indicating the portion of sky that is visible and obstructed. Access to sky means access to daylight. When combined with a sunpath diagram, solar access can be determined. This makes the shading mask diagram a nifty tool for designing passive solar buildings. Additional data such as solar insolation, relative humidity etc can further be overlapped on the sunpath diagram making this a very interesting design tool. This course will ensure you have a thorough understanding of the concept of shading mask and equip you to read the diagram.
Further, the course includes a tutorial that shows how you can create a simple DIY shading mask kit inorder to create diagrams on your own. Software that can be used to create shading mask is also shared.
A separate module on the application of shading mask as design tool walks you through some of ways this tool can be used. Design decisions such as the size of shading devices, the right orientation of buildings, identification of the location for solar renewable systems, determining the height of building forms at a master plan level and many others can be informed using this simple tool.
This course is designed in a highly engaging content giving you a learning experience thatâs comprehensive and fun at the same time. By the end of the course, youâll be ready to use shading masks in your design process.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to understand passive solar design
Architects and students of architecture who want to refresh their concepts on shading mask
Anyone who wants to learn a practical tool to creating shading mask profile for their project

courses.title: Sustainable Construction: Building a Greener Future
courses.bio: Principles, Strategies, and Standards of Eco-Friendly Design & Decarbonization in the Built Environment
objectives: Understand the global context on sustainability demand
Define the pathways of decarbonizing the built environment
Explain the active and passive design strategies for sustainable buildings
Understand the importance of building circularity index
requirements: Basic understanding of construction field
courses.description:
The construction industry is one of the largest contributors to global carbon emissions and resource depletion. As climate change accelerates, the demand for sustainable building practices has never been greater. This comprehensive course, Sustainable Construction: Building a Greener Future, equips you with the knowledge and tools to transform the way buildings are designed, constructed, and operatedâaligning with global sustainability goals and future-ready standards.
Whether you're an architect, engineer, contractor, project manager, student, or sustainability advocate, this course will empower you to lead the transition toward low-carbon, circular, and resilient built environments.


What Youâll Learn:
Why Sustainability Matters Now: Understand the urgent need to decarbonize the built environment and how construction impacts climate change.
Global Context & Drivers: Explore international trends, policies, and market forces shaping sustainable construction worldwide.
Defining Sustainable Construction: Distinguish between perceived and actual sustainabilityâwhat it truly means beyond greenwashing.
Real-World Case Studies: Analyze successful sustainable construction projects that balance environmental performance with economic and social value.
Passive & Active Design Strategies: Learn how to optimize natural light, ventilation, thermal comfort, and energy efficiency through innovative design.
Building Circularity Index: Discover how to assess and improve material reuse, recycling, and lifecycle performance in construction.


Who Is This Course For?
Architects and designers seeking eco-conscious design skills
Civil and structural engineers focused on sustainable materials and systems
Construction managers and contractors aiming to adopt greener practices
Students and researchers in architecture, civil engineering, or environmental science
Sustainability consultants and project developers
target_audience: Students of Civil and Architectural background
Industry professionals working in building decarbonization
Faculty of Civil and Architectural background

courses.title: From Digitisation to Intelligence
courses.bio: How Computers support the designers and the architects? Know about the taxonomy. Delve into the journey of evolution.
objectives: Articulate the significance of computers in architecture and design
Categorize software tools according to their potential
Categorize ideation tools according to their potential
Apply computational design process in architecture and design

AI and ML for architects and designers: AI and ML for architects and designers

requirements: Basic understanding about software used in architecture and design
Basic understanding about architecture and design domains
courses.description:
This course is designed to empower you with a deep understanding of the various applications and significance of computers in architecture and design. Computers have become essential aids for designers, playing a pivotal role in supporting ideation and design representation analysis and modelling. By learning the specific significance of these machine supports and tools, you can use them more effectively in your designs, enhancing your confidence and capability in the field.
In this lecture series, you will learn about the evolution of computer usage, delving into how this incredible machine has transformed the design landscape. The lecture series begins with the computer's usage as a digitiser in the initial days and takes you through the journey to its significance as an intelligent machine. Additionally, the course will introduce you to key scientific terminology and its relevance to architects and designers, providing a deeper understanding of the tools at your disposal.
As an architect and a computational designer, I would like to disseminate this knowledge to users to help them use this machine effectively for creation instead of merely converting their ideas. This knowledge transfer is with an expectation to motivate the learners to design and create using programming and coding and not limit themselves to using tools, software, and apps.
target_audience: Beginners in the domain of architecture and design

courses.title: Cooling Buildings Thoughtfully
courses.bio: Learn the principles of passive cooling design and use it as a teaching tool.
requirements: No prior knowledge or experience is required to take this course. You certainly need to be inspired to teach !
courses.description:
Designing buildings that reduce the need for active cooling is a key concept of energy efficiency. Clarity of the fundamentals of passive design and how to apply the theoretical principles in design resulting in creative solutions to thoughtfully cool the buildings is crucial knowledge. We believe that all architects should know how to design such buildings and all faculty teaching architecture should know how to teach students to design such buildings.
The 'Cooling Buildings Thoughtfully' course is designed for faculty of architecture to provide the tools and techniques for equipping future architects with the knowledge and competence to design buildings that reduce the demand for cooling. The focus of the course is to show various creative methods of practical application of technical concepts in architecture design.
The course contains 16 hours of content with over 20 lectures and 4 videos. While the course is self paced, we recommend that you go through each lecture sequentially. At the end of each lecture there is short quiz which will help you assess your understanding of the topic. Handouts have been provided on the 'lecture description' that can be downloaded to do the hands-on exercises. If you do not have a reliable internet connection, you could also download the presentations, video and additional resources to read it offline.
Is this the right course for you ?
If you have been trying to integrate theory and design - this is the right course for you !
If you want to see students come up with creative solutions using passive design principles - this course will help you get there !
If you have been looking for ideas to teach this seemingly complex and technical topic to students in an interesting and interactive way, you need to get started with this course right away !
By taking this course, you will be able to successfully demystify the concepts to students so they understand the design manifestation of the theory. This entire course can be used as a teaching tool. By completing this course, you have completed the first step in this process of successfully teaching building science fundamentals. The face to face training program that will follow this module will be next step in experimenting with application of theory using creative teaching techniques and tools.
target_audience: This course is meant for architecture professors teaching sustainability and energy efficient design. If you are looking for teaching tools that communicate the technical concepts in an easy to understand language, this is the right course for you. If you want your students to have the knowledge to design buildings with low cooling demand, you should take this course.

This course is not only for lighting designers, architects, interior designers, MEP consultants, warehouse managers, and Industrial owners but also for those who want to understand the power of lighting to provide better illumination in a sustainable way.
This course will also discuss what is the correct luminaire for different areas in a warehouse project.
You will also learn how to do the lighting design calculations using Dialux evo software and AutoCAD.

courses.title: Revit. Suggerimenti utili, trucchi e soluzioni pratiche.
courses.bio: Migliora la tua esperienza di utilizzo, acquisisci nuove capacitÃ  e vantaggi professionali rispetto alla concorrenza.
objectives: Acquisisci conoscenze specifiche, che tu sia un utente base o avanzato.
Impara qualcosa di nuovo con un format innovativo. Un video per argomento.
A tua disposizione, ove previsto, i files utilizzati durante i video.
Otterrai il tuo certificato nominativo di completamento del corso.

Come accedere ai files del corso.
Come dimensionare la vista per inserirla con precisione nella tavola di stampa.
Attenuare o eliminare l'effetto pixellato delle ombre nelle viste 3D.
Realizzare una animazione dello studio solare in alta qualitÃ .
REVIT DYNAMO. Unisci gli elementi per categoria .
Come creare una scala multipiano con altezze diverse.
Come visualizzare le parti nascoste di una famiglia caricata nel progetto.
Trucco per creare un'etichetta ed estrarre l'area di una campitura.
Come quotare le misure in diagonale in meno di 1 minuto, senza errori.
Quotare le diagonali con 1 Famiglia e 2 Click (file allegato)
Quote allineate, oblique e diagonali. Spiegazione completa.
Risolvi il messaggio di errore che vedi quando crei un parametro di rapporto.
Crea una sezione prospettica e inserisci un'immagine di sfondo.
Visualizza e gestisci le linee nascoste degli oggetti sottostanti.
Necessiti di altri corsi Revit? Non perderti questo video.
Come modellare un tetto a 2 falde con altezze interne date (da rilievo).
Inserire nelle viste un PDF ritagliato, con la scala corretta.
Il metodo migliore per forare un muro? APERTURA o SOLIDO?
Come ruotare una vista nella tavola di stampa.
Ritaglia le immagini inserite direttamente in Revit.
Come caricare un terreno da Excel nel modo coretto.
Come impostare la vista iniziale del tuo progetto e perchÃ© devi farlo!
Come modificare la struttura verticale del muro.
Non trovi le librerie dei modelli di progetto e delle famiglie di Revit?
Verifica le misure del progetto in 1 solo passaggio.
Come modellare un tetto gestito da 4 misure indipendenti. (utenti esperti)
Risparmia tempo nel disegno, imposta gli SNAP di angolo e distanza.
Crea gli sgocciolatoi con il comando bordo solaio.
Resettare l'elenco file recenti.
Presentazione - viste 3D sovrapposte
Manutenzione dei files di progetto
Avvisi. Gestione e soluzioni.
Ruotare una vista nella tavola di stampa.
Personalizza o resetta la barra multifunzione.
Salvare librerie di: Famiglie, Gruppi, Viste

Revit 2023. Filtri muro - nuova regola filtraggio.
Revit 2023. Icona esporta PDF e nuove funzioni
Revit 2023. Attiva/disattiva la visibilitÃ  controlli e quote
Revit 2023. Misurare nelle viste 3D e viste cinepresa.

Revit 2023. Sostituire la vista in un foglio.
Revit 2024. Nubi di revisione e revisioni

requirements: Nessun prerequisito Ã¨ richiesto per seguire questo corso.
Si consiglia un secondo monitor per visualizzare i video mentre ti eserciti sul principale.
courses.description:
In questa serie di video c'Ã¨ qualcosa per ogni progettista, studente e modellatore di Revit, per principianti e utenti esperti. Ogni video si concentra su un argomento specifico, fornendoti un suggerimento, un trucco o una tecnica di risoluzione ai problemi che potresti incontrare nell'uso di Revit.
Ciao, sono Ferruccio Della Schiava, Revit e BIM Expert, BIM Coordinator, Istruttore Certificato Autodesk, Progettista freelance e Consulente BIM/Revit, e sarÃ² il tuo docente durante questo percorso formativo.

Importi file CAD e desideri ottenere coerenza? Vuoi ottenere di piÃ¹ dalle tue quote? Hai bisogno di controllare tutte le viste in un progetto e vedere se le impostazioni sono corrette? Vuoi configurare in modo coerente i riquadri di ritaglio nell'intero progetto? Vuoi creare una copertura a partire da misure interne ed esterne da rilievo?

Questi sono solo alcuni degli argomenti ma ce ne sono a decine ed altri verranno pubblicati. Troverai sicuramente qualcosa di utile da aggiungere al tuo crescente arsenale di strumenti e tecniche Revit. Ed ancora. Se hai dubbi su un comando o una procedura, contattami tramite la sezione D&R (Domande e Risposte) se il quesito Ã¨ coerente con la filosofia del corso, potresti trovare a breve un video dedicato alla soluzione del tuo problema.

Buon corso!

Formazione avanzata a 360Â°, su argomenti di utilitÃ  pratica.
Migliorare la corretta esperienza d'uso di Revit.

courses.title: (1) IP_ Integrative Process of LEED BD+C v4
courses.bio: Allow me to deliver courses with experience in passing 6 LEED AP exams through self-study.
requirements: passion for sustainabilty
courses.description:
This course is for individuals who plan to understand LEED or even to take its GA, AP credential exams.
The instructor has passed 6 LEED AP exams, including Legacy and 5 specialties.
His teaching ability has been recognized as a USGBC Faculty.


LEED: Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design.
BD+C: Building Design and Construction
The former is the most popular sustainable rate system currently, the later is the sub-system under it.


First lecture: Brief Introduction of LEED: official associations, professional, etc.
Second lecture: Ten Scopes (Project Types) of LEED BD+C
Third lecture: Nine Credit Categories and Four Certification Levels of LEED BD+C
Fourth lecture: 1st credit category- IP, Integrative Process - prerequisite
Fifth lecture: 1st credit category- IP, Integrative Process - credit


We make every effort to provide accurate and complete information.
However, we cannot guarantee 100% accuracy.
Thank you and have a nice day.


The music is from YouTube Music Library copyright free: 88KeysToEuphoria - Aakash Gandhi




He-Kui Sustainability Matters
Ming-Feng Nian, Chicago Booth MBA, UMichigan MEng CEM,
LEED AP (Legacy + 5 specialties), WELL AP, SITES AP,
USGBC Faculty, Urban GHG Inventory Specialist,
EFFAS Certified ESG Analyst (CESGA)
GRI Certified Sustainability Professional (Standards 2021)
CFA Institute Certificate in ESG Investing
Project Management Professional, Portfolio Management Professional, Risk Management Professional, Scheduling Professional, Professional in Business Analysis, Agile Certified Practitioner

courses.title: Became Expert Solar Thermal Energy System Designer (Revit)
courses.bio: Solar Thermal Energy Systems using Revit

APPLICATION OF SOLAR THERMAL ENERGY: Application Of Solar Thermal Energy Systems
Solar Water Heating System Designing Usi: Hot and cold water supply system

requirements: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING SUBJECT
courses.description:
This course is about the solar energy as you know that solar energy is the type of renewable energy and we get energy from sun Millions of years ago, so this course emphasizes on the solar thermal energy. In solar thermal energy we can use energy from the sun without using photovoltaic cells. There are two type of solar thermal energy one is active, and another is passive so solar thermal energy having lot of applications like with the help of solar energy we can generate electricity by using concentrated solar thermal power plant. We can also use solar thermal energy for the drying of crops, food and other thing by using solar thermal air collectors. Similarly, we can also design Colling system using solar energy this can be happened by using solar absorption chillers. Similar we can also use solar thermal for space heating. We can also use solar energy for cooking of meal so we can use solar cooker. Similarly for purification of sea or salty water we can use the process of desalination for that process we can also use solar thermal systems. Solar geezer is one of the most useful systems in these days. So, at the end of this course, we can also design solar evacuated collector system and solar heating system by using Revit which is one of the most useful tools in this century for mechanical work.
COURSE CONTENT
INTRODUCTION OF RENEWABLE ENERGY AND THEIR TYPES
TYPES OF SOLAR ENERGY
SOLAR THERMAL ENERGY
CLASSIFICATION OF SOLAR THERMAL ENERGY
Application of Solar Thermal Energy
Solar Radiation
TYPES OF SOLAR RADIATIONS
LATITUDE AND LONGITUDE
Solar Space Heating.
Solar Water Heating
Forced-Circulation Systems :
Solar Concentrator
Types of Solar Concentrator
Solar Cooking
Types of Solar Cookers
Thermal Energy Storage
Low Temperature Solar Thermal Plant.
Solar Drying.

courses.description:
Civil 3D es un software compatible con BIM (modelado de informaciÃ³n para la construcciÃ³n) que cuenta con herramientas que permiten mejorar el dibujo, diseÃ±o, tiempo y efectividad de entrega y la documentaciÃ³n de construcciÃ³n. Civil 3D es un software de diseÃ±o que permite mejorar la entrega de proyectos, asegurar la coherencia de datos y reaccionar mÃ¡s rÃ¡pidamente ante las modificaciones.
En este curso el alumno aprenderÃ¡ a: importar, exportar y configurar puntos topogrÃ¡ficos; crear, editar y configurar superficies, perfiles longitudinales y secciones transversales; implantar y diseÃ±ar terraza con diferentes geometrÃ­as; calcular movimiento de tierra; crear tablas de puntos, lÃ­neas y movimiento de tierra.
Â¿A QUIEN VA DIRIGIDO?:
El curso va dirigido tanto a profesionales como a estudiantes del Ã¡mbito de Obra Civil, como pueden ser Ingenieros, Urbanistas, Arquitectos, TopÃ³grafos, Proyectistas Civiles, Dibujantes y estudiantes de las respectivas carreras.
El curso ha sido preparado de una manera explicita y prÃ¡ctica, al final de cada secciÃ³n encontraras un ejercicio en el que podrÃ¡s practicar lo aprendido, es importante que no dejes de hacerlo para que garantices un continuo aprendizaje en el curso. Puedes realizar estos ejercicios cuantas veces quieras, esto te ayudarÃ¡ a ganar destreza con el programa.
El curso esta dividido en 12 importantes temas, y tiene una duraciÃ³n aproximada de 10 horas dividas en 47 videos, es recomendable una dedicaciÃ³n diaria entre 1 y 2 horas para revisar el material y comprender toda la informaciÃ³n contenida en el curso y culminarlo satisfactoriamente a corto plazo.
target_audience: Ingenieros civiles, Arquitectos, TopÃ³grafos, Proyectistas Civiles y estudiantes de las respectivas carreras.

courses.title: Sketchup: The ÙArabic Workflow

objectives: Skecth up software
Architecture Modeling
Rendering your Model

Model Presentation: Test yourself (model the attached building in two hours)

requirements: AutoCAD Software
courses.description:
This course covers the workflow for architecture presentation, in Arabic language, suitable for beginner level with no experience before, it will help you to get good result with complete guide to different scopes through fourteen hours, in eight sections.
Starting from software interface, controls and navigation passing by modeling and modifying basic commands to advanced tools as dynamic components and advanced modeling workflow, ending by rendering process using Enscape plugin and retouching the results with photoshop, and at last using SketchUp Layout to export the model result.

requirements: Memiliki PC/Laptop yang diinstall Revit 2014 atau versi di atasnya.

courses.description:
Kursus ini merupakan kursus online terlengkap yang membahas tentang semua jenis family struktur yang dibutuhkan untuk keperluan modeling struktur. Semua family struktur dibahas pada kursus online ini mulai dari Pondasi (tiang pancang, bore pile, spun pile, sumuran, tapak beton, batu kali, dan tapak jalur beton), Kolom (kolom concrete kotak, concrete L, concrete T, kolom pipa, kolom WF/HB, kolom King Cross, kolom UNP, kolom T, kolom hollow, kolom komposit bulat HB/WF, dan kolom komposit bulat HB/WF, kolom L steel), Balok/beam/framing (balok concrete, balok WF/HB, balok UNP, balok T, balok L, lip channel, hollow, pipa, dan trekstang), Truss (Truss howe/truss datar, truss gable, mono truss, arc truss, dan truss sudut atas bawah), Soldier pile dan bentonite, Sheet pile (steel sheet pile, sheet pile I, sheet pile U), Drop panel, Slab Edge, Family Shared Parameter, Family Annotation, dan masih banyak lagi yang akan diupdate secara berkala.
Semua materi kursus ini diajarkan dengan penjelasan yang sangat detail agar peserta bisa benar-benar paham dengan materi yang disampaikan. Selain penjelasan yang detail, pada kursus ini juga disertakan banyak contoh dari kasus ril di lapangan, sehingga bisa diambil pelajaran secara langsung dari contoh-contoh kasus disampaikan.
Tidak tanggung-tanggung materi kursus online ini lebih dari 130 video yang mana memiliki total durasi lebih dari 19 jam lebih dan akan terus bertambah sesuai dengan materi baru yang diupdate dari kasus-kasus yang terjadi. Lihat pada Konten Kursus untuk detail materinya. Sangat rugi jika anda tidak mengikuti online course ini karena selain materinya yang sangat lengkap, kursus ini juga memiliki banyak sumberdaya yang bisa diunduh, keanggotaan selamanya, dan kemudahan akses melalui perangkat seluler.
target_audience: Kursus ini ditujukan untuk para drafter khususnya drafter struktur yang ingin benar-benar menguasai revit struktur sepenuhnya.
Kursus ini ditujukan untuk civil engineer/mahasiswa teknik sipil yang ingin mengetahui revit lebih jauh tentang pembuatan berbagai family struktur.
Kursus ini ditujukan untuk siapapun yang ingin belajar dan menguasai revit struktur dengan cepat.

DiseÃ±o de Interiores LowCost. DIY (Do It Yourself)
Aprende de forma integral el proceso de diseÃ±o y ejecuciÃ³n de espacios LowCost
Instructores: Arquitecto Ãlvaro GarcÃ­a y Arquitecta LucÃ­a FernÃ¡ndezÂ  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Estudiantes: +8.300 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


DescripciÃ³n del Curso:
Aprende a diseÃ±ar interiores LowCost sin renunciar a estilo ni funcionalidad. Con enfoque DIY, seguirÃ¡s un mÃ©todo integral: del brief y mediciÃ³n al layout, presupuesto, lista de compras y montaje. DescubrirÃ¡s materiales asequibles, upcycling, iluminaciÃ³n inteligente y trucos que maximizan el impacto con recursos mÃ­nimos.
En Udemy, 100% online y para todos los niveles, trabajarÃ¡s con plantillas, checklists y casos reales para lograr antes y despuÃ©s profesionales. Mejora tu hogar, impulsa tu portfolio u ofrece servicios de diseÃ±o de interiores LowCost desde cualquier paÃ­s, a tu ritmo, con decisiones seguras, sostenibles y orientadas al ahorro.
El concepto de diseÃ±o LowCost cada vez estÃ¡ mÃ¡s de moda en todo tipo de Ã¡mbitos de nuestro dÃ­a dÃ­a, motivado en parte por las sucesivas crisis econÃ³mica que nos acontecen en los Ãºltimos aÃ±os. En el Ã¡mbito del diseÃ±o de interiores y la arquitectura sucede algo similar, ya que muchos han visto la oportunidad que supone el diseÃ±o LowCost que facilita y democratiza el diseÃ±o de ambientes con poco presupuesto.

courses.title: Quantity Surveying & Building Estimate
courses.bio: Construction Cost Estimating and Quantity Surveying
objectives: Estimate in Civil Engineering
Estimate of Building
Calculate Complete Quantity of all material require for building using Excel
Calculate detailed quantity of complete building items using Excel
Prepare Complete Detailed Estimate of Building using Excel.
requirements: No Prior Experience required
courses.description:
This course is intended to provide key fundamental concepts required to understand Building Cost estimation. All materials and statements made in this course are for educational purpose only. Below are the main concepts covered in this course.
1. Define Cost estimation; this is a key to becoming successful as cost estimator
2. Understand the steps involved in cost estimation; these are applicable to most projects
3. Understand the basic skills required to become cost estimator
4. Define the different classes of cost estimates; This is critical as it help to pick the right estimating methodology and provide the expected accuracy
5. Identify the main players in a building project
6. Distinguish building systems; You need to know them to be able to cost them
7. Explain the main types of project delivery methods. This would affect your cost estimate.
8. Understand the concepts of resources, materials, labour and equipment as applied to building construction
9. Understand sources of valuable information for a cost estimator. This is critical and very helpful
10. Understand the common types of partitions in a buildings
11. Perform a quantity takeoff of building interiorâs systems as a general contractor.
12. Understand the fundamental and application of costbooks such as RsMeans in Cost estimation (Bonus!)

Master Roundabout Corridor Modeling in Civil 3D 2024 Hindi/Urdu : A Complete Road Design Course
Are you ready to take your Civil 3D skills to the next level? This course is your ultimate guide to mastering roundabout corridor modeling Manually, a Mount Everest of road design. Whether you're a civil engineer, land surveyor, road designer, or CAD professional, this course will equip you with the tools and techniques to excel in your field.

Create existing surface models with precision.

Develop assemblies using IFC typical sections.
Master manual corridor modeling for roads, intersections, and roundabout.
Generate sample lines, cross-sections, and corridor surfaces.

This course offers a hands-on, step-by-step approach, ensuring you gain practical skills to apply directly to real-world projects.
Why Choose This Course?
Comprehensive Content: Covers everything from basics to advanced techniques for roundabout and road design.
Practical Workflow: Focus on manual modeling to give you complete control over your designs.
Beginner-Friendly: Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone new to Civil 3D.
Lifetime Mentorship: I am always here to guide you for any assistance in Civil 3d.
Who Should Enroll?
This course is ideal for civil engineers, road designers, land surveyors, CAD professionals, and students looking to enhance their Civil 3D skills or start a career in infrastructure design.
Enroll now and start creating professional road designs with confidence using AutoCAD Civil 3D!

This quick guided course is designed to help you download and install Revit with ease, all for free.
Autodesk does visually redesign the install process each year, so if what is on your screen looks slightly different, don't worry, the process is still the same.


In this course, I will guide you on:
1. How to create an Autodesk account,
2. Explain the system requirements to run the software,
3. How to ensure you get the correct certified hardware,
4. How to correctly insert your template and library files onto your computer.


I will not only guide you through the installation process but you will be able to direct message me for further assistance.


Bonus material:
As a bonus, I have included the following videos
1. A 1-hour guide on the interface, including the 2024 updates,
2. A guide to the terminology that is used when using Revit,
3. A video on what is BIM?


Finally:
I have provided links to my top-rated course on Revit, so you can continue your journey of learning everything you need to know on Revit!


Please feel free to contact me with any questions you may have on how to correctly download and install the software.
I am more than willing to guide you through this process.


All the best, from your trainer!
Steve

requirements: Mampu mengoperasikan komputer dasar
courses.description:
Apakah Anda ingin menggali potensi penuh dari dunia desain arsitektur modern? Apakah Anda ingin menjadi ahli dalam menciptakan desain bangunan yang inovatif dan efisien? Jika jawaban Anda adalah "ya," maka Kursus Revit Profesional kami adalah pilihan yang tepat untuk Anda.
Mengapa Memilih Kursus Revit?
Revit adalah perangkat lunak desain BIM (Building Information Modeling) yang sangat populer dan digunakan secara luas oleh para profesional arsitektur, insinyur, dan kontraktor di seluruh dunia. Kursus kami akan membantu Anda:
Menguasai Revit: Dari dasar hingga tingkat mahir, Anda akan menguasai berbagai fitur dan alat Revit yang penting untuk desain bangunan modern.
Meningkatkan Efisiensi: Revit memungkinkan kolaborasi yang mulus antara anggota tim proyek, mempercepat proses desain, dan mengurangi kesalahan konstruksi.
Berada di Garis Depan Industri: Kemampuan Revit sangat dicari oleh perusahaan dan profesional desain terkemuka, memberi Anda keunggulan kompetitif dalam karir Anda.
Mengapa Memilih Institut Desain Arsitektur Modern?
Instruktur Ahli: Anda akan belajar dari para profesional yang berpengalaman dalam industri, yang memiliki rekam jejak yang solid dalam menggunakan Revit dalam proyek-proyek dunia nyata.
Kurikulum Terstruktur: Kursus kami dirancang secara cermat untuk memastikan Anda mendapatkan pengetahuan yang komprehensif tentang Revit, mulai dari dasar hingga tingkat lanjutan.
Fasilitas Modern: Lingkungan pembelajaran yang nyaman dan dilengkapi dengan teknologi terkini akan meningkatkan pengalaman belajar Anda.
Sertifikat Resmi: Setelah menyelesaikan kursus, Anda akan mendapatkan sertifikat resmi yang diakui oleh industri, memvalidasi keterampilan Anda dalam menggunakan Revit.
Kursus Revit kami mencakup berbagai topik, antara lain:
Pengenalan Revit dan antarmuka pengguna.
Modelling elemen arsitektur seperti dinding, lantai, dan atap.
Pemodelan struktur dan sistem MEP (Mechanical, Electrical, Plumbing).
Presentasi visual dengan menggunakan Render dan Animasi.
Kolaborasi dan Manajemen Proyek dengan Revit.
dan lain-lain
target_audience: Para mahasiswa, arsitek, teknik sipil, desainer interior/exterior, structure engineer, MEP engineer

Watch the Preface introduction to the LEEDÂ APÂ BD+C course.

courses.title: Autodesk Revit Structure Essential Training 2017 (Metric)
courses.bio: Autodesk Revit Structure - Building Information Modelling Design for Structural Engineering in Hindi | Urdu
objectives: Create you Structure Project using Autodesk Revit
Get any job in construction field
Get any job as a BIM Modeler
Get attractive salary working on Structure Project using Autodesk Revit Software
requirements: Basic Knowledge of structure drawing .
Basic Knowledge about AutoCAD software.
courses.description:
In this Revit Structure 2017 training course, Mohammad Gulshad (Instructor) will teach you the fundamentals of building information modeling for structural engineering in Hindi | Urdu language. This course is designed for the absolute beginner, meaning no prior experience with Revit or other CAD/BIM software is required.
You will start with a tour of the user interface and learn about the new features in Structural Projects. Mohammad GulshadÂ then teach you the basic creation and editing tools, then move on to showing you how to start a structural project. This course will also cover how to work with views, set up levels and grids, and add columns and walls to your model. You will learn how to add a foundation, create structural reinforcement, and place beams and framing. How to create floor systems and shaft openings, add detailing with all exercise files.
Once you have completed this computer based training course, you will have developed the knowledge necessary to use the tools and techniques in Revit Structure to create your own models. Working files are included, allowing you to follow along with the author throughout the lessons.

Com efeito, os softwares disponÃ­veis (2D e 3D) nada mais sÃ£o que meios para desenvolver e/ou para apresentar ideias. A criatividade, portanto, permaneceÂ  como um fator imprescindÃ­vel e um diferencial do profissional da Arquitetura exigido pelo mercado de trabalho.


Para os exercÃ­cios oferecidos, os alunos podem usar os programas que melhor dominam:Â AUTOCAD ou BIM, pois o que importa Ã© o resultado e nÃ£o os meios. Este Ã© um curso que trata da criatividade e nÃ£o tem como objetivo ensinar o uso do softwares aplicados Ã  Arquitetura e nem aferir o quanto o aluno domina essas tecnologias. Parte-se do princÃ­pio de que o que faz um arquiteto Ã© sua criatividade, e nÃ£o o domÃ­nio do conhecimento sobre aplicativos (!).Â Este curso propÃµe o aprendizado do processo criativo considerando oÂ  cumprimento dos demais protocolos de natureza tÃ©cnico-funcional. SÃ£o oferecidos exercÃ­cios intermediÃ¡rios anteriores ao ExercÃ­cio Final. No ExercÃ­cio Final, em nÃ­vel de Estudo Preliminar, oÂ aluno Ã© convidado a pensar uma soluÃ§Ã£o para o tema proposto: uma casa, e assim ter a chance de praticar o que foi ensinado.

O curso tem 17 aulas de curta duraÃ§Ã£o de conteÃºdo objetivoÂ nas quais Ã© oferecida a teoria ilustrada por meio de vÃ­deos e slides, de maneira a tornar o ensino dinÃ¢mico e prazeroso.

requirements: Basic Autodesk RevitÂ® knowledge.
No programming/coding required!
courses.description:
This course will take your RevitÂ® workflows to the next level. Master in Revit Workflows will enable to start automating repetitive and boring tasks with no programming or coding knowledge. Work smarter, not harder.
I will guide you from the installation of the required software to the creation of your custom RevitÂ® toolbar with new efficient workflows. More than 25 exclusive workflows are introduced and reviewed within the Master in Revit Workflows. You will not find them anywhere else. These new workflows will make your BIMÂ modelling more efficient and accurate as well as produce cleaner and higher quality models.
A few examples are; Create Wall/Floor Finish by Room, Align & Distribute Elements & Tags, Duplicate Sheets & View, Purge Unused in Families, Delete Families by Files Size, Delete Empty Sheets, Clean Revit Temporary Files and much more.
After creating a custom RevitÂ® toolbar, we will dive in how you can share it with your team and enable your workflows to the rest of the team. Then, we will introduce how you can take control of your BIM tools. Keep track of who in your team, when and which specific workflows were run more often. Start leading your team with data driven decisions.
target_audience: BIM Modellers & Architects looking to improve Revit workflows.

courses.title: Architectural 3d Modeling in Rhino (Ø¨Ø§ÙØ¹Ø±Ø¨ÙØ©)
courses.bio: A complete beginner guide for using Rhino on architectural context
objectives: Rhino interface and fundamentals
Architectural molding in Rhino
Architectural diagrams
2d Drawing from 3d models
requirements: You should have rhino 6 installed on your machine
courses.description:
Rhino is somewhat easier than other 3d modeling programs, and its simplicity does not stand in the way of creating complex models, which makes it a great software for architectural students and professional architects especially in the early stages of the design process.
I have been using Rhino for over four years as a student and in a professional context, I can describe it as fully rounded software and almost covers all that architects need from cad software, but it shines the most on creating 3d models for complex architectural forms and elements.
The course is divided into four sections.
the first section will introduce you to the basics of using Rhino and a list of commands that I found useful in architectural modeling.
After finishing this section you would be able to model the following architectural elements stairs, ramps, windows, doors, walls, slabs, and columns.
After finishing this section you would be able to create simple diagrams and generate 2D drawings from 3D models in Rhino.
the last section of the course has a list of command tips and tricks that I have found very useful I could not leave them out.
If you feel hesitant or intimidated think no more the course is designed for complete beginners and after finishing this course, you would be able to work, design, model, and producing high-quality diagrams using rhino 6.

You've mastered the basic modeling techniques in 3ds Max, now it's time to use that power on a real architectural project! This course is the second and most critical stage of our modeling series: we take your foundational knowledge and transform it into a tangible portfolio piece through a complete professional workflow.

PREREQUISITE: This is a Continuation Course
This training is designed as a follow-up for students who have completed our "Intro to 3ds Max Modeling (Module 1)" course or possess equivalent foundational modeling skills. If you are starting from scratch, I highly recommend taking Module 1 first to get the most out of this course.
In This Project-Based Course (Module 2), You Will:
Transition from a 2D AutoCAD plan to a 3D scene in 3ds Max.
Model a complete architectural piece using professional techniques.
Take your finished model into Lumion for fast and impressive rendering.
This project-based course is Week 3 of our 8-Week Portfolio Camp, where you build a powerful project on top of the foundational skills you learned in Week 2 (Module 1). It's ideal for architecture/interior design students and 3D artists ready to apply their knowledge. Join this second, critical step of the series to take your modeling skills to the professional level!

requirements: Conocimientos bÃ¡sicos de dibujo tÃ©cnico
Para imprimir los ejercicios debes tener a tu disposiciÃ³n una impresora, ya sea tuya, de un amigo o en una copisterÃ­a
Para realizar los ejercicios necesitas escuadra, cartabÃ³n, compÃ¡s y lÃ¡piz para dibujar
courses.description:
Con este curso aprenderÃ¡s el Sistema DiÃ©drico de principio a fin, explicado de manera sencilla, clara y ordenada.
En este primer volumen del curso de un total de 3, partimos desde cero -para absolutos principiantes- y avanzamos por los elementos bÃ¡sicos del Sistema DiÃ©drico (punto, recta y plano) hasta llegar al abatimiento de todos los diferentes tipos de planos que existen.
AdemÃ¡s de las lecciones en vÃ­deo incluye una gran cantidad de ejercicios y sus soluciones asÃ­ como una autoevaluaciÃ³n final para que puedas aprender a tu ritmo y de manera autÃ³noma.
El Sistema DiÃ©drico es el sistema de representaciÃ³n mÃ¡s universal utilizado en dibujo tÃ©cnico y constituye la base para entender cualquier disciplina grÃ¡fica. Con este curso te convertirÃ¡s en un experto en Sistema DiÃ©drico, incluso aunque tus conocimientos a dÃ­a de hoy sean nulos en esta Ã¡rea.
En el primer mÃ³dulo del curso veremos una introducciÃ³n al sistema diÃ©drico, que es el principal sistema de representaciÃ³n utilizado en geometrÃ­a a nivel mundial. TambiÃ©n veremos sus aplicaciones prÃ¡cticas.
Seguidamente en el mÃ³dulo 2 veremos la introducciÃ³n al punto, con los casos de todos los cuadrantes. El mÃ³dulo 3 es para la recta, el mÃ³dulo 4 para el plano y el mÃ³dulo 5 es para los abatimientos.

Estudiantes de oposiciones a secundaria para dibujo tÃ©cnico que quieran consolidar el sistema diÃ©drico o tengan dudas sobre el mismo
Toda aquella persona que quiera aprender el sistema de representaciÃ³n grÃ¡fico tÃ©cnico mÃ¡s universal

courses.title: Belajar Revit 2022 2023 Untuk Pemula
courses.bio: Memahami Prinsip Dasar Program Revit dalam Arsitektur dan dapat Membuat Rumah Tinggal 2 Lantai
objectives: Memahami prinsip-prinsip dasar Revit 2022 2023, dan dapat segera mempraktekkannya dalam sebuah project sederhana rumah 2 lantai
Dapat membuat Rumah Tinggal Sederhana 2 Lantai
Memahami permodelan dasar Revit, layouting dan penyajian presentesai
Dapat memulai sebuah projek rumah tinggal dari awal sampai akhir

Pengantar: Beberapa Hal Yang Perlu diketahui sebelum memulai
Tentang Atap: Menambahkan Fascia dan Soffit pada Atap

requirements: Dapat mengoperasikan komputer
Memiliki Program Revit 2022 atau 2023. Untuk Versi Demo 30 hari dapat di download di website Autodesk secara gratis
Mengerti prinsip dasar Arsitektur
Memiliki keinginan belajar yang kuat
courses.description:
Autodesk Revit adalah salah satu alat (tool) software yang digunakan dalam industri konstruksi bangunan untuk mencapai Building Information Modelling, atau yang disingkat dengan BIM.
Revit bukanlah sekedar alat permodelan 3 dimensi, namun jauh lebih dari itu. Revit dapat menciptakan sebuah project, yang seluruh bagian dari project tersebut terintegrasi satu sama lain. Perubahan di satu aspek project seperti denah atau tampak, akan langsung bepengaruh tehadap bagian lain dari project tersebut, sehingga gambar akan selalu terupdate dari sisi manapun, dan hal ini mengurangi pekerjaan berulang yang biasa dilakukan, sehingga mempersingkat waktu, memperkecil kesalahan dilapangan. Dan anda bisa lebih fokus melakukan hal yang paling penting bagi Anda, yaitu menciptakan karya Arsitektur yang terbaik.
Tutorial online ini cocok untuk anda yang belum memiliki pengalaman apapun, ataupun Anda yang sudah menggunakan program ini untuk beberapa waktu. Didalam tutorial ini kita akan mengulas satu persatu seluruh hal yang berhubungan dengan pengaplikasian software Revit Architecture ini, untuk menciptakan sebuah project arsitektural.
Kita akan Belajar tentang Prinsip-prinsip pengoperasian Revit pada level awal. Ada beberapa hal yang tidak kita bahas, karena dianggap kurang relevan dengan tingkat pembahasan kita pada saat ini.
Konsep pembelajaran pada tutorial ini adalah dengan memahami prinsip dasar elemen-elemen yang ada pada Revit, dan langsung menerapkannya pada sebuah project, dalam hal ini kita akan membuat Rumah Tinggal 2 Lantai Sederhana.

courses.title: Vastu Shashtra ( Part 1 )
courses.bio: Learn it scientifically and Logically and Practically
objectives: You will learn about Corner Plots
Complete Knowledge Google earth Pro and how to take degree
Complete Knowledge about how to Grid a Plot
Complete Knowledge about Vastu software
requirements: No prior Knowledge is required of Vastu
courses.description:
In this course, Dear Students, we are going to understand the VASTU SHASHTRA in complete scientific way.
we will go deep in vastu and understand how it works for us and affect our daily life.
we will learn about
Introduction of Vastu
knowledge of 16 Directions
Deep analysis of 5 Elements
Detailed conversation about 32 Entrances
Sound knowledge of 45 Energy Fields


Key Principles of Vastu Shastra:
Directional Alignment: Vastu emphasizes the importance of aligning the structure with the cardinal directions, primarily the north, east, and northeast. Each direction is associated with specific elements and energies, and proper alignment is believed to bring positive vibrations.
Five Elements: Vastu considers five elements â earth, water, fire, air, and space â and their balanced presence within a building. Proper placement of these elements is believed to promote harmony and balance.
Site Selection: The selection of a suitable site for construction is crucial in Vastu. Factors such as soil quality, slope, shape, and surrounding environment are considered to determine the positive or negative effects on the occupants.
Room Layout: Vastu suggests specific guidelines for the layout and design of different rooms within a structure. For example, the placement of the master bedroom, kitchen, and living room is given special attention to ensure the flow of positive energy.
Energy Flow: Vastu emphasizes the smooth flow of energy (prana) throughout the building. The positioning of doors, windows, and architectural elements is planned to facilitate the circulation of positive energy and prevent blockages.
target_audience: This course is for every individual

courses.title: CG ACADEMY - FURNITURE DESIGN CON BLENDER 2.8
courses.bio: Un corso dettagliato sull'arredamento e il design con Blender
objectives: A fine corso, gli studenti saranno in grado di realizzare una cucina, un divano, un bagno, un tappeto e dei tavolini in vetro
Nel futuro, saranno inoltre in grado di affrontare la problematica "interni" con facilitÃ  e velocitÃ

La Cucina: Modellazione di zoccolo, top, alzatine, schienale e boiserie
Impostazioni della camera e della messa a fuoco
Il Divano: Modellazione della scocca e del basamento del divano
Materiali: tessuto cuscini, bracciolo e struttura
Il Trittico Ponte: Modellazione dei tavolini, materiale e rendering in Cycles
Impostazioni per ottenere il vetro con Eevee
Il Tappeto in Seta: Composizione della scena, inquadratura e asset
Ultimi ritocchi, impostazioni della camera e rendering
Il Bagno: Modellazione dello specchio e del pensile
Ultimi ritocchi, camera, focus e rendering

requirements: E' necessario un minimo di conoscenza di Blender (2.79 o, meglio 2.8), almeno a livello base. Si consiglia pertanto il corso di Blender 2.8 su GoPillar Academy
courses.description:
In questo corso a tema "furniture design" si affrontano 5 macro argomenti propri dell'arredamenti di interni e del design.
Vengono analizzati, in 5 moduli (+ 1 introduttivo), partendo da zero:
- realizzazione di una cucina
- realizzazione di un divano
- realizzazione del trittico di tavolini Ponte
- realizzazione di un tappeto
- realizzazione di un bagno
Nel corso delle lezioni si affrontano diversi aspetti che vanno dalla modellazione, all'illuminazione, ai materiali PBR, e al rendering, nonchÃ© alla fisica Cloth e Fluid.
Si affrontano inoltre le impostazioni del software e le problematiche dei due motori di rendering Cycles ed Eevee.
Imparerete a cimentarvi abilmente nell'ambito dell'arredamento utilizzando uno strumento potentissimo e versatile: BLENDER 2.8!


Caratteristiche del corso:
- CIRCAÂ 10 OREÂ EÂ 30 MINUTI DIÂ LEZIONI
- 5 ARGOMENTIÂ DETTAGLIATI
- HIGH DEFINITION TEXTURES EÂ IMMAGINI
- MATERIALIÂ AVANZATIÂ EÂ ILLUMINAZIONE
- RIFERIMENTIÂ ESTERNI
- FILES *.BLEND EÂ ALTRIÂ ASSETS


TUTTIÂ GLIÂ ASSETÂ SIÂ TROVANO ALLEGATIÂ ALLAÂ PRIMAÂ LEZIONEÂ DIÂ OGNIÂ MODULO.
target_audience: Chiunque desideri usare Blender come un potente strumento nel campo dell'arredamento, dell'architettura e del design

Gli architetti, i designer di interni e i progettisti troveranno questo corso indispensabile per imparare a creare velocemente e in modo efficare i propri ambienti 3D e gli arredi, da mostrare ai propri clienti in modo fotorealistico

courses.description:
Este es el tercer de un conjunto de 4Â cursos denominados "Autocad Civil3D para TopografÃ­a y Obras Civiles" que te permitirÃ¡ aprender a manejar este fabuloso software de Autodesk y aplicarlo a diferentes proyectos y obras de construcciÃ³n. Vuelvete un experto en el software y podrÃ¡s generar movimientos de tierra, calcular materiales y precios de obra y crear grandes diseÃ±os de carreteras, puentes, alcantarillado entre otros.
Este conjunto de cursos ha sido producto de horas de dedicaciÃ³n, trabajo y esfuerzo, recopilando los datos mas importantes en el tema de la IngenierÃ­a Civil y TopogrÃ¡fica, resumiendo grandes cantidades de teorÃ­a y volviendolas practicas, para que tu puedas aprender de una manera facil y rÃ¡pida con clases cortas pero especificas para cada tema y practicar con todos los datos (reales) y ejemplos que aquÃ­ te brindamos.
Si quieres comenzar a manejar este software, participar en este curso te va a ahorrar semanas de trabajo investigando por tu cuenta lo que nosotros ya hemos investigado, haciendo las pruebas que hemos hecho, y cometiendo los errores que ya hemos cometido.

courses.title: Revit. BIM Specialist esercitazione esame pratica.
courses.bio: Esercitazione all'esame pratico della figura professionale "BIM Specialist Revit Architettura"
objectives: Completato il corso avrai consolidato le tue abilitÃ  e le conoscenze dei processi di modellazione BIM di Revit Architecture.
Avrai conseguito velocemente i tuoi obiettivi di apprendimento con un workflow mirato e completo.
Sarai in grado di modellare un progetto architettonico, senza perdite di tempo.
Sarai pronto ad affrontare l'esame pratico BIM Specialist Revit Architettura.
Otterrai il tuo certificato nominativo di completamento del corso.
requirements: Il corso non Ã¨ adatto agli utilizzatori inesperti di Revit. Alcuni concetti base sono dati per scontati.
Per potersi esercitare ed usare i files allegati, occorre munirsi di una versione d Revit, non antecedente alla 2019.
Si consiglia un secondo monitor per visualizzare i video mentre ti eserciti sul principale.
courses.description:
Ciao, sono Ferruccio Della Schiava, Revit e BIM Expert, BIM Coordinator, Istruttore Certificato Autodesk, Progettista Freelance e Consulente BIM/Revit e sarÃ² il tuo docente durante questo percorso formativo.

In questo modulo formativo dedicato alla figura professionale del BIM Specialist Certificato, affronteremo insieme una simulazione dell'esame pratico per il conseguimento della certificazione.
La figura professionale, altamente richiesta, Ã¨ l'operatore della modellazione informativa, competente nella disciplina Architettonica, che opera all'interno delle singole commesse, in grado di utilizzare la documentazione e i software dedicati per la modellazione degli oggetti e la produzione degli elaborati.
Il corso ripercorre le fasi per la modellazione informativa di un edificio residenziale multi piano di nuova costruzione (LOD B richiesto), avente determinate caratteristiche tecniche e precisi componenti da modellare, finalizzati ad assolvere alle richieste di elaborati grafici da produrre. Il tutto partendo da una planimetria in DWG.

Anche se non interessato all'esame di certificazione, il percorso formativo offre comunque suggerimenti e metodi per impostare correttamente e gestire agevolmente il tuo modello BIM durante le fasi progettuali ma soprattutto come avere il massimo controllo su ogni suo aspetto grafico in ogni vista del tuo progetto Revit. Questo corso insieme agli altri della mia collezione Ã¨ orientato alla comprensione di Revit piÃ¹ che alla spiegazione pedissequa di una serie di comandi.

Buon corso!
target_audience: BIM user che vogliono prepararsi all'esame pratico di certificazione BIM Specialist Revit Architettura di qualsiasi ente certificatore.

Are you ready to take your architectural design skills to the next level? This comprehensive course will guide you from the basics to advanced techniques in AutoCAD, SketchUp, and Lumion, transforming you into a proficient designer capable of creating stunning architectural plans, 3D models, and photorealistic renders.
In this course, you will start by mastering the essentials of AutoCAD, learning how to create detailed floor plans, working drawings, and submission-ready designs. Weâll then move on to SketchUp, where youâll learn how to model buildings and interiors from scratch, apply realistic materials, and create detailed 3D environments. Finally, youâll bring your designs to life in Lumion, producing breathtaking renders and animations that will impress clients and stakeholders.
What Youâll Learn:
Create detailed architectural plans using AutoCAD tools and features.
Model complex 3D structures and interiors with SketchUp, from basic shapes to advanced components.
Apply materials and textures in SketchUp to create realistic and professional-looking models.

Course Highlights:
Step-by-step instructions suitable for beginners and advanced users alike.
Practical assignments and real-world projects to enhance your learning experience.
Tips and tricks for optimizing your workflow and improving your productivity.
Lifetime access to the course materials, including updates and new content.
Whether youâre an aspiring architect, interior designer, or just passionate about architectural visualization, this course will provide you with the skills and knowledge needed to succeed in the industry. Enroll now and start your journey towards becoming a professional architectural designer!

courses.title: The Efficient BIM Coordinator (Management Part) - Arabic
courses.bio: Mastering Tools, Workflows, and Strategies for Seamless BIM Coordination
objectives: Understand the role of a BIM Coordinator, manage weekly tasks, and ensure smooth project workflows to facilitate BIM processes effectively.
Prepare for BIM Kick-off meetings by setting up ACC folders, managing access, publishing models, and establishing project documentation standards.
Manage post-Kickoff tasks like linking models, reviewing shared models, federating models, and organizing effective BIM/coordination meetings.
Perform weekly tasks including QA/QC checks, clash detection, COBie and IFC compliance, interoperability reviews, and team reporting.
Enhance productivity by leveraging tools like PyRevit, PyArchitect, E-F, and Diroots to automate workflows and streamline coordination.
Solve BIM issues using Dynamo, including fixing warnings, managing line patterns, creating schedules, and aligning floors with topography.
Troubleshoot BIM issues like Revit version errors, Desktop Connector problems, view conflicts, and optimize Revit performance with advanced tools.
Ensure collaboration by conducting interoperability health checks, managing shared views, and publishing updates efficiently using ACC.

Preparing for BIM Kick-off Meeting: Example of a BIM Kick-off Meeting
The BIM Coordinator Weekly Tasks: Monday - Consuming the models and creating the federated model
Wednesday - ACC coordination and communication with the teams
Thursday - QA/QC Check of the Revit models
Friday - Notifying, Publishing, and Emailing the updated models

requirements: Basic knowledge of BIM workflows and familiarity with Revit software.
Understanding of architectural or engineering design processes.
Experience with model collaboration and coordination in a BIM environment is helpful but not mandatory.
A desire to learn advanced BIM coordination techniques and tools like PyRevit, PyArchitect, and Diroots.
courses.description:
The Efficient BIM Coordinator is a detailed, practical course designed to transform you into a highly efficient BIM Coordinator. Whether you're new to the role or looking to refine your expertise, this course provides the tools, workflows, and strategies to streamline your BIM coordination process and boost productivity.
Throughout the course, you'll gain hands-on experience in managing key BIM tasks, such as preparing for and leading BIM kick-off meetings, organizing project documentation, and ensuring smooth collaboration across multidisciplinary teams. You'll dive deep into essential BIM coordination tools like PyRevit, Dynamo, and Diroots, learning how to automate workflows, solve common issues, and enhance efficiency.
The course also covers vital topics like model federation, clash detection, quality assurance checks, and interoperability health checks, giving you the skills to ensure seamless data integration and prevent costly project delays. You'll also explore troubleshooting methods for common BIM issues, including Revit version problems, Desktop Connector errors, and view ownership conflicts.
By the end of the course, you'll have the knowledge and confidence to lead BIM coordination efforts effectively, manage complex projects, and resolve challenges in real-time. Whether you aim to enhance your skills or prepare for a leadership role in BIM coordination, this course will help you achieve your professional goals.
Join now to master the art of efficient BIM coordination and elevate your career!
target_audience: This course is designed for BIM Coordinators, BIM Managers, Architects, Engineers, and other professionals involved in BIM workflows and project coordination. Itâs ideal for those looking to enhance their skills in BIM management, improve project collaboration, and master advanced tools like PyRevit, Dynamo, and Autodesk Construction Cloud. Whether youâre experienced or transitioning into a BIM Coordinator role, this course will equip you with practical knowledge to excel in your career.

Are you ready to embark on the adventure of designing a custom home? If so, this is the course for you!
You might just be starting and filled to the brim with excitement, you may have just finished scrolling endless blueprint websites, or you might already be a little frustrated trying to sketch out a design on paper.Â  Wherever you are at, IÂ can help you.Â  Let's take a step back and give you a framework to make designing your dream home an enjoyable and effective experience.

If youâre looking for a fast, realistic, and user-friendly solution in the visualization world, youâve come to the right place. In this course, youâll discover step-by-step why Corona Renderer has become one of todayâs most popular render engines for photorealistic results without the complexity.
What You Will Master in This Course:
PBR Materials: Create physically based, ultra-realistic materials like wood, metal, and glass.
Professional Lighting: Add realism with powerful tools like HDRI, Corona Sun, and the revolutionary LightMix, which allows you to change lighting after the render is finished.
Cinematic Camera Settings: Apply artistic touches with Depth of Field (DoF), motion blur, and perspective control.
Render Optimization: Learn the most efficient settings for the fastest possible render times without sacrificing quality.
Post-Production: Elevate your final renders with Photoshop and AI-powered editing techniques.
This comprehensive course is designed for interior designers, architects, and 3D artists who want to achieve high-quality, fast, and effective renders. Basic knowledge of 3ds Max is required. Join now to bring speed and photorealism to your projects!

courses.description:
In questo corso imparerete a realizzare efficaci modelli 3D di architetture (di interni ed esterni) e renderizzarle in modo realistico, per poi interagire con esse come se vi trovaste davvero all'interno.
Il corso Ã¨ destinato a progettisti, architetti, designer, arredatori, ristrutturatori e agenti immobiliari che desiderano mostrare il loro progetto in modo altamente fotorealistico e addirittura tuffarsi all'interno di esso come se ci si trovasse all'interno di un videogioco in prima persona, interagendo con gli oggetti, aprendo e chiudendo le porte, accendendo e spegnendo le luci.
La finalitÃ  Ã¨ quella di mostrarsi all'avanguardia con i propri clienti, facendoli innamorare dei vostri progetti grazie all'immersione e all'interazione con essi. Uno strumento potentissimo e molto ricercato.
Nel corso non Ã¨ richiesta una particolare abilitÃ  o conoscenza del settore della computer grafica, nÃ© tanto meno in quello della programmazione. I due software adottati, Blender (2.7x) per la modellazione 3D e per la renderizzazione "statica" e Unreal Engine 4 per l'interazione sono entrambi Open Source e GRATUITI. La potenza e la professionalitÃ  di entrambi e assolutamente rinomata.
Il corso Ã¨ strutturato in 3 moduli:
- BLENDERÂ - COSTRUZIONE DEL MODELLO ARCHITETTONICO PER RENDER STATICO;
- BLENDER - COSTRUZIONE DEL MODELLO ARCHITETTONICO PER INTERAZIONE;
- UNREAL ENGINE 4 PER 'INTERAZIONE.
Il corso segue un percorso preciso in cui ci si prospetta di realizzare un modello di una villa completa, con gli interni e gli esterni, realizzando viste fotorealistiche. Il Primo modulo Ã¨ pensato per le viste statiche (render) interne ed esterne, mentre il secondo rivede la modellazione per essere poi esportata in Unreal Engine 4 per l'interazione.
L'approccio Ã¨ pratico e essenziale in base agli argomenti esposti (architettura), ma consente, una volta appresi i concetti di spaziare da soli in altri progetti e campi.
Non Ã¨ richiesta alcuna competenza in materia di programmazione, in quanto la programmazione visuale (Blueprint) in Unreal Engine 4 Ã¨ spiegata per quanto attiene gli argomenti affrontati (Player, materiali, animazione porte, accensione luci).
Sono forniti tutti gli asset necessari per procedere con i progetti e possono essere scaricati dalle lezioni di competenza.
Inoltre, in regalo, sono forniti:
- il PRIMOÂ VOLUME di "BLENDERÂ - LAÂ GUIDAÂ DEFINITIVA", il primo di una serie di ben 5 libri (2500 pagine) che affrontano ogni aspetto in dettaglio di Blender;
- il volume "PBRÂ THEORYÂ &Â BLENDER", in cui si siegano i concetti fondamentali del fotorealismo in funzione del comportamento reale della luce incidente sulle superfici;
- il volume "UNREALÂ ENGINEÂ 4 PERÂ TUTTI", in cui si procede passo passo nella creazione di un breve videogioco.
Buon divertimento!

requirements: Mampu mengoperasikan komputer dasar
courses.description:
Dalam era digital yang semakin maju, desain tiga dimensi (3D) telah menjadi landasan utama dalam berbagai bidang, mulai dari arsitektur hingga animasi. Salah satu perangkat lunak yang sangat populer dan digunakan secara luas untuk tujuan ini adalah SketchUp. Dalam artikel ini, kita akan membahas pentingnya mengikuti kursus SketchUp untuk menguasai seni desain 3D, serta manfaat yang akan Anda peroleh dari kursus ini.
Mengapa Mengikuti Kursus SketchUp? Kursus SketchUp menawarkan banyak manfaat yang akan membantu Anda dalam mengembangkan kemampuan desain 3D Anda. Dari pemahaman dasar hingga teknik-teknik canggih, kursus ini membekali Anda dengan pengetahuan yang diperlukan untuk menghasilkan karya yang menakjubkan. Berikut adalah beberapa alasan mengapa mengikuti kursus SketchUp adalah langkah yang bijak:
Pemahaman Mendalam tentang Perangkat Lunak: Kursus ini memberikan panduan rinci tentang berbagai fitur dan fungsi SketchUp. Anda akan memahami antarmuka pengguna, alat-alat desain, dan cara mengoptimalkan penggunaan perangkat lunak ini.
Pengembangan Keterampilan Desain 3D: Dalam kursus, Anda akan mempelajari teknik-teknik desain 3D, termasuk pembuatan bentuk, modifikasi objek, dan penyesuaian detail. Ini membantu Anda menghasilkan model yang lebih akurat dan realistis.
Penerapan dalam Proyek Nyata: Kursus SketchUp sering kali mencakup proyek-proyek praktis yang mereplikasi situasi dunia nyata. Ini memberi Anda kesempatan untuk menerapkan pengetahuan yang Anda pelajari dalam lingkungan yang simulatif.
Pemahaman tentang Rendering dan Visualisasi: Seorang desainer 3D yang mahir tidak hanya menghasilkan model, tetapi juga mampu menghasilkan tampilan visual yang menakjubkan. Kursus ini akan memperkenalkan Anda pada teknik rendering dan visualisasi yang efektif.
Manfaat Mengikuti Kursus SketchUp: Mengikuti kursus SketchUp membuka peluang dan manfaat yang berlimpah. Beberapa di antaranya adalah:
Peningkatan Karir: Kemampuan desain 3D yang kuat adalah aset berharga di banyak industri, termasuk arsitektur, desain interior, konstruksi, dan periklanan. Sertifikat dari kursus ini dapat meningkatkan peluang karir Anda.
Kreativitas Tanpa Batas: Dengan pengetahuan yang diperoleh dari kursus, Anda dapat mengubah ide-ide kreatif menjadi model 3D yang menakjubkan. Ini memungkinkan Anda untuk mewujudkan konsep-konsep yang sulit dijelaskan hanya dengan gambar 2D.
Kolaborasi yang Lebih Baik: Mampu menghasilkan model 3D mempermudah komunikasi dengan tim atau klien Anda. Anda dapat memberikan pandangan yang lebih jelas tentang desain Anda dan menghindari salah pengertian.
Kebebasan Eksplorasi Desain: Kursus ini membekali Anda dengan alat untuk mengeksplorasi berbagai ide desain. Anda dapat dengan mudah menciptakan alternatif desain dan melihat bagaimana setiap perubahan memengaruhi hasil akhir.
Mengikuti kursus SketchUp adalah investasi berharga bagi siapa saja yang tertarik dalam dunia desain 3D. Dari pemula hingga profesional, kursus ini membawa manfaat besar dalam bentuk pengetahuan mendalam, keterampilan teknis yang unggul, dan peluang karir yang lebih luas. Dengan menguasai seni desain 3D melalui kursus SketchUp, Anda akan membuka pintu menuju kreativitas tak terbatas dalam dunia desain modern. Jangan ragu untuk memulai perjalanan Anda dalam menguasai SketchUp hari ini.
target_audience: Para mahasiswa, arsitek, teknik sipil, desainer interior/exterior, structure engineer, MEP engineer

courses.description:
Este Ã© um curso on-line e, por conseguinte, para que o aprendizado tenha efeito, Ã© necessÃ¡ria a participaÃ§Ã£o do aluno: Fazer os exercÃ­cios propostos; oferecer questionamentos; buscar aprofundar o conteÃºdo. HÃ¡ tambÃ©m o mercado de Cozinhas Industriais, que leva a conhecer mais profundamenteÂ o tema, pois Ã© necessÃ¡rio ampliar tanto o conhecimento sobre o processo para a produÃ§Ã£o de refeiÃ§Ãµes como sobre os equipamentos. O Arquiteto pode, portanto, tornar-se um especialista, e assim atender nÃ£o sÃ³ as indÃºstrias como tambÃ©m restaurantes, hotÃ©is e hospitais.


Apesar da duraÃ§Ã£o do curso de Arquitetura ser de cinco anos, Ã© impossÃ­vel o aprofundamento necessÃ¡rio em muitos dos conhecimentos aprendidos. NÃ£o hÃ¡ nenhuma matÃ©ria voltada pra um aprendizado capaz de tornar o estudante um especialista em projetos para cozinhas, e muito menos no caso das industriais. Esse conhecimento acaba sendo apreendido na prÃ¡tica ou de maneira empÃ­rica. Sendo assim, um dos objetivos deste minicurso Ã© oferecer umÂ complemento aoÂ curso de Arquitetura.


Ã guisa de introduÃ§Ã£o, sÃ£o ensinados os princÃ­pios de importantes Ã¡reas do conhecimento: a Ergonomia e a Antropometria. A Ergonomia Ã© a disciplina cientÃ­fica relacionada ao entendimento das interaÃ§Ãµes entre seres humanos e outros elementos de um sistema de trabalho. OÂ seu conhecimento induz a projetar a fim de otimizar o bem-estar humano e o bom desempenho nos ambientes de trabalho. A Antropometria reconhece os diferentes biotipos e assim, as medidas do corpo humano que variam de acordo com a raÃ§a. Assim, esse conhecimento torna-se um forte aliado do bom rendimento de ambientes de trabalho, pois como nos ensina a prÃ³pria arquitetura: "As coisas devem estar Ã s medidas do Homem".


AlÃ©m disso, sÃ£o ensinados os princÃ­pios para pensar o lay-outÂ  de acordo com as especificidades das cozinhas residenciais e industriais.


ExercÃ­cios sÃ£o oferecidosÂ  para a prÃ¡tica da teoria. O conteÃºdo Ã© formado por aulas de curta duraÃ§Ã£o com objetividade e dinamismo.


O curso Ã© vitalÃ­cio e conta ainda com a interaÃ§Ã£o entre aluno e instrutor, que tem como princÃ­pio responder os questionamentos da maneira mais cÃ©lere possÃ­vel.


Como em qualquer curso, recomenda-se um estudo contÃ­nuo por meio de outras fontes. No caso das cozinhas industriais, recomenda-se visitas Ã s empresas especializadas apÃ³s a conclusÃ£o deste curso a fim de adquirir maior conhecimento, sobretudo, o relativo aos equipamentos e tecnologias disponÃ­veis no mercado. Visitas a cozinhas de hospitais e hotÃ©is sÃ£oÂ  uma alternativa a considerar a fim de que sejam feitos estudos de casos.


Aos leigos que se interessarem pelo curso, o conteÃºdo pode servir como aprendizado para formar critÃ©rios de avaliaÃ§Ã£o do trabalho de profissionais a serem contratados e, como consequÃªncia, assim, para aferir a qualidade do projeto e dos produtos aplicados.

Con este mÃ©todo, puedes disminuir sustancialmente la factura de la luz y aumentar el confort y salud de tus clientes en el interior de sus viviendas al incorporarlo dentro de tu mÃ©todo de diseÃ±o. ArcGIS es el software mÃ¡s empleado en el campo de los Sistemas de InformaciÃ³n GeogrÃ¡fica, tiene como funciÃ³n el manejo de informaciÃ³n geogrÃ¡fica por esta razÃ³n es empleado en diferentes campos como lo son: teledetecciÃ³n, gestiÃ³n del territorio, gestiÃ³n de riesgo de desastres, topografÃ­a, hidrologÃ­a, urbanismo, geomÃ¡tica, catastro, agronomÃ­a y ciencias de la tierra, entre otros.
La metodologÃ­a del curso es prÃ¡ctica y directa, con una breve explicaciÃ³n de la funciÃ³n de determinado producto. Con los conocimientos impartidos en este curso podrÃ¡s analizar e integrar informaciÃ³n geogrÃ¡fica relacionada al territorio. Al finalizar podrÃ¡s realizar mÃ©todos de anÃ¡lisis de datos geogrÃ¡ficos, manejo de herramientas del software, los cuales son requeridos en el campo laboral.
El curso ha sido diseÃ±ado con el uso de la versiÃ³n ArcGIS 10.6.1. Este curso comprende los siguientes niveles: BÃ¡sico, Intermedio y Avanzado.
Siendo el nivel bÃ¡sico completo, en el nivel Intermedio y Avanzado se tocan los temas mÃ¡s relevantes requeridos en el Ã¡mbito laboral.
Al finalizar este curso obtendrÃ¡s mÃ¡s oportunidades laborales, como tambiÃ©n te diferenciaras de la competencia al utilizar este software de gran relevancia para los Sistemas de InformaciÃ³n GeogrÃ¡fica.Â  Asume el reto de aprender nuevos conocimientos y la satisfacciÃ³n de emplearlos en tu carrera profesionalÂ  Â¡InscrÃ­bete!

courses.description:
This workshop will help you create a complete architectural BIM project from design to the working stage in a consulting office, producing "Working or IFC Drawings." It will also cover the construction phase in a contracting company, producing "Shop Drawings." This process will require you to learn how to coordinate with other disciplines, which will be covered in the workshop. You will also be able to create company templates and master the creation of Parametric Families, as these will be part of the companyâs standards.


You will learn how to work with a full BIM team through collaboration, dividing tasks among yourselves and sharing in their completion. You will understand all the documents used in the technical office, including RFIs, RFPs, sample submissions, and approvals from the consultant. Additionally, you will manage a complete project with all its components using Revit. You will be fully prepared to work on large projects and eager to enhance your technical skills in the BIM field. In this workshop, you will learn to:
Create a complete architectural project using BIM for consulting offices and contracting companies.


You will cover:
Creating a model from scratch for a real project.
Developing the model to LOD 300.
Understanding the nature of structural, mechanical, and electrical models.
Learning how to coordinate between different sections using Revit.
Linking the model to the quantities.
Managing all architectural quantities.
Extracting and printing all executive drawings.
Creating all shop drawings and elevating detail to LOD 400.
Using Navisworks for more precise coordination with other specialties.
Working with real document samples for the consultantâs responses to the contractor and how to correct the issued comments for a clean copy.
Extracting As-Built drawings.
Creating renders using Enscape to attach to the shop drawings and the As-Built.
Determining site coordinates.
Using Dynamo to speed up work and verify model accuracy.

Ya sea para la escuela, el trabajo, o presentarse en algÃºn concurso; son muchas las ocasiones que diseÃ±amos un proyecto y tenemos que presentarlo, una manera de sintetizar toda nuestra informaciÃ³n es crear una lÃ¡mina arquitectÃ³nica.

Â¿QuÃ© aprenderÃ© en este curso?


En este curso aprenderÃ¡s a diagramar y presentar de manera profesional los componentes de un proyecto arquitectÃ³nico en una lÃ¡mina de presentaciÃ³n , utilizando los paquetes Adobe Illustrator y Adobe Photoshop.

courses.title: Kursus Lengkap Drafting dengan AutoCAD LT
courses.bio: Seri Pelatihan CAD dan BIM
objectives: Menggambar dan Memodifikasi Objek di AutoCAD
Menggambar dengan Akurasi di AutoCAD

Layout dan Printing di AutoCAD

requirements: PC/ laptop

courses.description: Kursus drafting dengan AutoCAD LT adalah peluang yang luar biasa bagi para calon desainer, insinyur, dan profesional yang ingin menguasai seni merancang secara presisi. Dalam kursus ini, peserta akan dipandu melalui serangkaian materi yang komprehensif, mulai dari pengenalan dasar tentang penggunaan perangkat lunak AutoCAD LT hingga keterampilan drafting yang lebih kompleks. Peserta akan diajar oleh instruktur yang berpengalaman dalam mengoperasikan AutoCAD LT, perangkat lunak yang telah terbukti memberikan hasil akurat dalam bidang desain arsitektur, teknik sipil, manufaktur, dan berbagai industri lainnya. Peserta akan belajar bagaimana menghasilkan gambar teknik dengan akurasi tinggi, menggunakan berbagai alat gambar, serta mengatur dimensi dan anotasi sesuai standar industri. Selain itu, kursus ini juga akan membekali peserta dengan pemahaman tentang penggunaan layer dan tata letak lembar kerja yang efisien, memungkinkan mereka untuk mengorganisir proyek mereka dengan lebih baik. Keunggulan AutoCAD LT dalam menciptakan desain 2D akan dijelaskan secara mendalam, membantu peserta memahami bagaimana menggambar berbagai objek, mengedit entitas, dan menyusun tampilan visual yang profesional. Baik bagi pemula yang belum pernah menggunakan AutoCAD LT maupun bagi yang ingin meningkatkan keterampilan mereka, kursus ini akan memberikan pengetahuan yang mendalam tentang teknik drafting, penggunaan layer, dimensi, anotasi, serta output cetak atau digital. Kursus ini akan memberikan dasar kuat dalam dunia drafting menggunakan AutoCAD LT, yang sangat berharga dalam karir desain dan rekayasa.

Como consequÃªncia, nas primeiras aulas o principal objetivo Ã© levar o aluno a entender que um conceito deve ser o elemento condutor primordial do processo criativo que pode se dar a partir do exercÃ­cio de analogias e abstraÃ§Ã£o como meios para alcanÃ§ar novas abordagens para o tema em questÃ£o.
