courses.description:
Benvenuti in questo corso base di ArchiCAD, il noto software di progettazione architettonica con funzioni B.I.M.
In questo corso base (propedeutico al corso avanzato), sviluppato dal bravissimo architetto Francesco Gigliano, imparerete ad utilizzare ArchiCAD quanto basta per costruire il vostro progetto, completo di elementi strutturali, paesaggistici, finiture e arredi, rappresentandolo graficamente in 3D e in 2D , montato su tavole di presentazione.
ArchiCAD Ã¨ il software B.I.M. completo per tutte le esigenze, facile da imparare, veloce usare, largamente utilizzato negli studio di architettura, di ingegneria, di progettazione e dai costruttori edili.
Con ArchiCAD Ã¨ facilissimo progettare e realizzare progetti di qualsiasi dimensione con la potente suite di strumenti integrati e unâinterfaccia intuitiva che lo rendono il software BIM piÃ¹ efficiente e intuitivo sul mercato. Con la documentazione di progettazione pronta allâuso, la pubblicazione con un click, il rendering fotorealistico e la migliore funzionalitÃ  di analisi, ArchiCAD vi consente di concentrarvi su ciÃ² che sapete fare meglio: progettare grandi edifici.


Argomenti delle lezioni:
1 INTRODUZIONE
-1 Storia della progettazione CAD e BIM
-2 ArchiCad, filosofia del programma, interfaccia grafica
2 L'EDIFICIO VIRTUALE
-1 Impostazioni del progetto, primitive 2D
-2 Solai
-3 Muri
-4 Colonne e pilastri
3 FINITURE ED ARREDI
-1 Porte e finestre
-2 Scale e parapetti
-3 Arredi
4 OGGETTI PARAMETRICI
-1 Librerie
-2 Attributi
-3 Pareti continue
5 SITO E PAESAGGIO
-1 Visualizzazione 3D
-2 Mesh
-3 Oggetti di completamento
6 RAPPRESENTAZIONE GRAFICA
-1 Zone
-2 Sezioni
-3 Assonometrie e prospettive
7 PUBBLICAZIONE
-1 Abachi
-2 Disegni e layout
-3 Stili di visualizzazione e rendering


N.B.: Gli asset di supporto sono allegati nella lezione 4.

This course introduces the academic approach of Sustainability and explores how LEED strategies can endure in the face of global change, ecosystem degradation and resource limitations.

The goal is to share knowledge needed to maximize building performance, achieve LEED certification and help prepare for LEED examinations.

courses.description:
Learn Bar Bending Schedule From Scratch
Starting with understanding the Basic Of Bar Bending Schedule you will be amazed where you reach by the end of this course.
We Will Start Bar-bending From Basics For Those Who Are Beginners. And Then We Will Create B.B.S For Different Structure With The Help Of Cad And Excel.
Now Lets look About The Topics That Are Included In This Course.
Bar Bending Schedule Basic (Meter And Millimeters)
How to Find Cut Length Of Main Bars.
Bend Deductions For Different Angles.
Clear And Effective Cover.
How to Find Overlap In Different Bars.
How to Find Cut Length Of Crank Bar-Or Bent Up Bar.
How to Find Cut Length Of Rectangular Stirrups.
How to Find Cut Length Of Triangular Stirrups.
How to Find Cut Length Of Diamond Stirrups.
How to Find Cut Length Of Circular Stirrups.
How to Find Cut Length Of Chair Bar.
How to Find Cut Length Of 4 or 6 Legged Stirrups.
Bar Bending Schedule Basic (Feet And Inches)
How to Find Cut Length Of Main Bars.
How to Find Cut Length Of Crank Bar-Or Bent Up Bar.

How to Find Cut Length Of Triangular Stirrups.
How to Find Cut Length Of Diamond Stirrups.
How to Find Cut Length Of Circular Stirrups.
How to Find Cut Length Of Chair Bar.
How to Find Cut Length Of 4 or 6 Legged Stirrups.
Bar Bending Schedule Sheets In Excel
How to Create B.B.S Excel Sheet (Meter And Millimeters)
How to Create B.B.S Excel Sheet (Feet And Inches)
Bar Bending Schedule For Different Structure
Bar Bending Schedule For Footing.
Bar Bending Schedule For Columns.
Bar Bending Schedule For Beams.
Bar Bending Schedule For slab.
Bar Bending Schedule For Circular Slab.
Bar Bending Schedule For Stairs.
Bar Bending Schedule For Septic Tank.
Bar Bending Schedule For Retaining Wall.
Bar Bending Schedule For Cantilever Beam.
About This Course
Comprehensive B.B.S course online with 62 HD video lectures.
B.B.S Sheets in Excel.
Drawings Of Different Structures.
Practice Questions For Your Practice.
Taught By Well Trained Professional Instructor.

courses.description:
Aprende a diseÃ±ar y presentar proyectos de arquitectura con un acabado profesional. Este curso te enseÃ±arÃ¡ el rumbo de la arquitectura de hoy en dÃ­a y cuÃ¡l serÃ¡ su desarrollo con las nuevas tecnologÃ­as que se pueden implementar en Revit Architecture
Conoce la forma correcta de trabajar los proyectos arquitectÃ³nicos que enfrentamos a diario con Revit Architecture.

Disminuye los errores de diseÃ±o y aumenta tu efectividad en la presentaciÃ³n de proyectos de arquitectura.
Con este programa aprenderÃ¡s a construir tridimensionalmente todos los elementos que posee una construcciÃ³n en la vida real. Aprende a construir y diseÃ±ar entornos de proyectos, asÃ­ como la diagramaciÃ³n y presentaciÃ³n de planos a clientes. courses.title: BIM met ArchiCAD - Module 1: Voorontwerp
courses.bio: Modelleer en presenteer een gebouw op een schematische wijze, volgens de voorstelling van de fase Voorontwerp.
objectives: model, present and document a basic 3D building, including drawings, sections, elevations and presentation images (rendering)
understand the use of BIM authoring software, such as ArchiCAD
requirements: Graphisoft ArchiCAD, available from MyArchiCAD.com, free for students, 30-day trial for commercial users
Elementary construction knowledge of a building: walls, floors, stories, doors/windows
Understanding of Architectural Representation: drawings, plans, sections, elevations
courses.description:
This course (in Dutch) takes you through the modelling of a small, single-family residential building, from scratch. It follows the Building Information Modelling (BIM) methodology and uses Graphisoft ArchiCAD, which is a popular BIM authoring software, available for OSX and Windows.
Dit is de eerste module van een cursus Building Information Modeling met ArchiCAD.
Deze reeks videos is een introductie tot het maken en presenteren van digitale gebouwmodellen met ArchiCAD. Deze werden geconcipieerd en opgenomen door Stefan Boeykens en maken gebruik van ArchiCAD 18 NED (de regionale versie van ArchiCAD voor BelgiÃ« en Nederland, verdeeld door Kubus). Het grootste deel van de inhoud is bruikbaar met andere taalversies of ook (iets) oudere versies van ArchiCAD.
Deze module omvat de ontwerpfase "VoorOntwerp", met de focus op een niet-gedetailleerde, schematische weergave van het model, zoals gebruikt tijdens de conceptfase en de eerste ontwerp presentaties.
Er wordt een 3D Model van een kleine, eengezinswoning uitgewerkt. Hoewel alle stappen worden doorlopen, wordt niet iedere modelleerstap voorgedaan.
Er wordt wel een algemene bouwkennis verondersteld en ook een zekere ervaring met algemene grafische software is aanbevolen.
Het ontwerp bevat een aantal bewust gekozen elementen, zoals een deel plat dak en een deel hellend en ook de aansluiting tegen een buurwoning.
Andere modules (in andere cursussen) zullen verder ingaan op een "UitvoeringsOntwerp" en andere aspecten van de ArchiCAD software.
target_audience: Students of architecture or architectural-engineering or civil-engineering
architects who want to learn BIM using ArchiCAD

courses.bio: Puentes postensados con Revit 2022
objectives: configuracion del programa
georreferenciacion del proyecto

requirements: tener instalado la version 2018 o superior del programa revit
modelado basico del programa revit
courses.description:
Con el programa Revit es posible realizar la idealizaciÃ³n y conceptualizaciÃ³n de un estructura dentro de un modelo 3D, del cual uno podrÃ¡ tener un control absoluto de dichos elementos y a la vez compararlos con los volÃºmenes de obra, por lo general el programa Revit es utilizado para poder modelar cualquier tipo de edificio o vivienda ya sea de HormigÃ³n armado o una estructura metÃ¡lica, pero tambiÃ©n existe la posibilidad de poder modelar cualquier estructura de tipo puente ya sean de hormigÃ³n armado, pretensado o puentes metÃ¡licos.
Dentro de este curso se modelarÃ¡ los elementos que comprenden a la superestructura e infraestructura a partir de familias paramÃ©tricas, las cuales nos permitirÃ¡ manipular y controlar las secciones transversales por las cuales estÃ¡n compuestas la superestructura e infraestructura y de esta manera poder obtener una plantilla tipo que nos sirvan en futuros proyectos
Curso orientado a la modelado y documentado de un puente de vigas postensadas utilizando el programa Revit 2022, a la georreferenciaciÃ³n y exportaciÃ³n del modelo digital generado a programas como civil 3D, navisworks, infraworks.
Adicional al curso, tambiÃ©n se realizarÃ¡ la verificaciÃ³n estructural de dicho puente dentro del programa CSi bridge v22 donde se realizarÃ¡ la verificaciÃ³n de solo la superestructura por la que estÃ¡ compuesta dicho puente
target_audience: Ingenieros, y estudiantes de ramas a fines

Asimismo, es ideal para personas interesadas en los sistemas de informaciÃ³n geogrÃ¡fica que deseen aprender desde cero a manejar QGIS, con un enfoque prÃ¡ctico y orientado a resultados aplicables en proyectos reales.


MetodologÃ­a de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vÃ­deo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artÃ­culos didÃ¡cticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interÃ©s, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalizaciÃ³n, tutorizaciÃ³n online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicaciÃ³n del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tÃº quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase segÃºn tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al mÃ¡ximo la formaciÃ³n, pero tambiÃ©n puedes decidir ver este curso como una guÃ­a de referencia.
Las clases estÃ¡n claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten mÃ¡s importantes segÃºn tus necesidades formativas. La mayorÃ­a de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lecciÃ³n sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formaciÃ³n se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso estÃ¡ orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer mÃºltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Ãlvaro GarcÃ­a y LucÃ­a FernÃ¡ndez. AdemÃ¡s la formaciÃ³n disponen de acceso automÃ¡tico al contenido, sin limitaciÃ³n de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al dÃ­a los 7 dÃ­as de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantÃ­a de devoluciÃ³n.

Start with this comprehensive courseÂ to begin your studies of sustainability andÂ green building using the LEED Rating System. There are no eligibility requirementsÂ to be LEEDÂ Green Associate - LEEDÂ GA! all you have to do is to take the course and book for your exam! The course is provided in both English and Arabic languages.


How to be a LEEDÂ Green Associate in steps:
Watch the Preface introduction to the LEEDÂ Rating System.
Take a LEEDÂ Green Associate Course or Workshop.
Study and take simulation exams and practice tests.
Register on USGBCÂ and Pay for the exam.
Follow the instructions on USGBCÂ and schedule the exam.
Go for the exam with confidence.

The LEED course was prepared by a USGBC-approved instructor "USGBCÂ Faculty - Karim elnabawy.Â  USGBCÂ® Faculty are experienced educators with a strong background in professional education, training, and facilitation in green building and sustainability development.


The following are some insights into the course content:
Pass your LEEDÂ Green Associate exam on your first attempt.
Understand the LEEDÂ Rating systemÂ in detail.
Learn more about LEEDÂ Accreditation and Certification levels.
Test your knowledge with quizzes after each chapter.
Receive study hints for how to pass the exam from the first time.
Receive a full study plan for your LEEDÂ preparation.
Receive a copy of presentation slides in PDF formats as handouts.
Learn the sustainable credit categories along with strategies: (Integrative process - Location and Transportation - Sustainable Sites - Water Efficiency - Energy and Atmosphere - Materials and Resources - Indoor Environmental Quality - Innovative design - Regional priority).
Understand the synergies between each credit category and find out the trade-offs.
Receive a certificate of completion from Udemy after completing all course videos, quizzes, and tests.
Receive -Â upon request once the course is completed (Without additional fees) :
- Reference letter from the instructor to be used as a supporting document for your academic studies, work, or as an additional certificate in your CV including curriculum in detail attested by USGBC and GBERAÂ initiative
- Receive a certificate of completion attested by USGBCÂ and GBERA Initiative.
- After trainingÂ On-going support.

Las clases estÃ¡n claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten mÃ¡s importantes segÃºn tus necesidades formativas. courses.title: AutoCAD 2D per tutti
courses.bio: Impara ad usare AutoCAD 2D in modo veloce ed effeciente!
objectives: A padroneggiare con AutoCAD in ambiente 2D
A rappresentare progetti architettonici
A impaginare i progetti
A creare blocchi dinamici e cartigli
requirements: Nessun requisito particolare
courses.description:
AutoCAD Ã¨ lo strumento indispensabile per tutti i progettisti, gli architetti, gli ingegneri, i geometri, i designer e gli strutturisti, il moderno tecnigrafo dell'era digitale.
Semplice all'uso, veloce, intuitivo e versatile, AutoCAD dispone di tutti gli strumenti per disegnare, impaginare e stampare qualsiasi progetto. Ricco di librerie esterne, facilmente reperibili anche online, permette di spaziare in qualsiasi campo progettuale e di interfacciarsi con molti altri software.
Questo corso tratta esclusivamente - e volutamente - dell'aspetto 2D del disegno automatico, benchÃ© AutoCAD abbia gli strumenti per realizzare anche modelli 3D, incluso l'editor dei materiali e del rendering.
Tuttavia siamo del parere che ogni software nasce ed Ã¨ pensato per uno scopo primario e quello di AutoCAD pesa principalmente nella rappresentazione tecnica bidimensionale di un progetto. AutoCAD nasce per realizzare tavole progettuali e dettagli tecnici in 2D. Per la rappresentazione 3D, specialmente quella fotorealistica, si rimanda e si consiglia vivamente l'utilizzo di altri software dedicati come 3D Studio Max, Blender e Maya, cosÃ¬ come per i modelli destinati alla prototipazione ci si dovrebbe sbilanciare su Rhinoceros e per la rappresentazione tridimensionale di aspetto piÃ¹ "volumetrico" o "a mano libera" probabilmente Ã¨ Sketchup il programma piÃ¹ indicato.
AutoCAD resta comunque e sempre lo strumento base della progettazione, sia essa architettonica, strutturale o esecutiva; un elemento fondamentale per qualsiasi professionista del settore.
Nella quarta lezione sono disponibili file e materiale didattico.

courses.description:
Bienvenidos a este curso de Photoshop Orientado a las tareas de arquitectura y diseÃ±o de interiores.
Soy Joel Combes diseÃ±ador y publicista Dominicano e instructor certificado de adobe en Photoshop e illustrator. Soy un fanÃ¡tico del diseÃ±o y tambien tengo publicado en udemy otros cursos relacionados con diseÃ±o como Photoshop e Illustrator para novatos desde cero.
En esta clase vamos a iniciar aprendiendo las herramientas bÃ¡sicas y haciendo ajustes de imagen bÃ¡sicos que mejoren la iluminaciÃ³n de las imÃ¡genes y render.
Este curso es para principiantes que inician desde lo bÃ¡sico, y que estÃ¡n orientado a proyectos de arquitectura y diseÃ±os de interiores.
Vamos a hacer un proyecto de diseÃ±o de interiores en el cual te voy a enseÃ±ar como partir desde un espacio vacÃ­o y llegar poner multiples elemento de ambientaciÃ³n y decoraciÃ³n.
Luego vamos a hacer una planta arquitectÃ³nica, te voy a mostrar cÃ³mo iniciar desde un plano a blanco y negro que viene de un programa de cad y poner todos los elementos.
tambiÃ©n vamos a hacer una perspectiva desde cero. Este proyecto te va permitir la libertad de explorar un acabado completamente diferente para las elevaciones y perspectivas arquitectÃ³nicas. vamos a iniciar desde una perspectiva en lÃ­neas planas blanco y negro de tu programa de CAD, hasta hacer toda una representaciÃ³n artÃ­stica de la estructura.
Â¿Sabes los que son los render en pases?
Los render en pases son una tÃ©cnica en la cual puedes sacar los render en diversas piezas como color, fondo, mapas de sombras y otras caracterÃ­sticas mÃ¡s, segÃºn el motor de render que uses. De esta forma puedes hacer mÃ¡s eficiente los fotomontajes en photoshop.
Finalmente vamos a hacer una pieza de arte publicitario, en el cual te voy a mostrar como hacer un volante publicitario de un proyecto inmobiliario, para que puedas ver el proceso paso a paso.
Este curso estÃ¡ basado en aprender con ejercicios prÃ¡cticos, de modo que cada concepto aprendido serÃ¡ parte de un proyecto que vas a poder hacer desde cero, y te voy a dar las imÃ¡genes y recursos para que puedas seguir los videos tal cual.
TambiÃ©n te voy a pedir que hagas proyectos propios, basados en los mismo conceptos, que te ayuden a reafirmar los conocimientos y habilidades aprendidas.
AsÃ­ que que te invito a iniciar, que yo te voy a yudar en el camino.

courses.title: The Fundamentals of Hand Drafting for Garden Designers
courses.bio: An Introduction to Using Pen and Ink in Landscape Design

Introduction to Drafting Tools: Using The Scale Rule - Imperial Values
Using the Scale Rule - Metric Values
Plotting a Site Survey: Plotting Your Site Survey - A Demonstration
Using the Drafting Compass for Triangulation

requirements: No prior experience is required, but the student should be prepared to obtain the drafting equipment I demonstrate using.
courses.description:
This is not a course on Garden Design.Â  It is a course for teaching those who are new to drafting or simply prefer to draft by hand rather than drawing on the computer (CAD).
While CAD is a useful tool and skill to be learned and used, hand drafting will help you to develop more creative design solutions as well as alternative solutions.Â  The reason is simple, hand drafting allows you to explore different ideas quickly without being caught up in the minutia of working with a monitor and mouse.
This course will explain and demonstrate how to properly use the drafting board, adjustable triangles, drafting compass and scale rules - both imperial (feet and inches) and metric.Â  The use of technical drawing pens will also be covered.
This course is in 3 sections.Â  Section 1 will consist of 6 lessons covering how to use the basic drafting tools used in landscape design. Section 2 will explain and demonstrate how to plot a site survey, select the proper scale (in either Imperial or Metric) and use triangulation to locate objects within the property accurately.Â  Finally, Section 3 will cover proper planting graphics and symbols used in garden design for both conceptual and working drawings as well as coloring the plan by hand using colored pencils and pastels for presentation.Â  No prior drafting experience is required, but access to the equipment demonstrated is highly recommended.
target_audience: This course is for beginning garden designers who prefer drawing plans by hand rather than on the computer. This course is an explanation and demonstration of traditional, hand drafting including using technical pens. Drafting using ink is optional but will result in a cleaner and permanent design drawing. Proper planting graphics that can be used in both conceptual and working drawings will be explored.

courses.description:
this course is the introduction into bim management and the first module of a 12 module course which forms the a road map on making the best bim manager, bim coordinator.
this introduction course is combined of 7 sections with 49 lectures. discussing theory, concepts, terminologies, tools, assets, vocabs, standards, techniques, relationships and meanings of BIM management & workflow in addition to the relationship between BIM project phases and concepts to the riba plan of work 2020, it also walks through an introduction about the used standards including pas 1192 and bs iso standards, in addition to the BIM uses, Goals, and benefits mentioned in qatar public works authority eir.


The course is taking close and detailed view into the most common used bim topics, issues, vocabulary, and answers the most asked questions:
1- what is bim
2- why do we need bim
3- when do we need to use bim
4- how do we start with bim
The course does also cover a brief on bim risks, challenges, barriers and benefits as well, and does also cover many other topics.
at the end of this course you will find the last section with an expert challenge where the instructor has a gust speaker who was challenged to explain some bim facts from real projects.




the course is a mix of arabic and english languages.

courses.title: 18 Essential Tools in Autodesk Revit for Beginners
courses.bio: Learn Most Needed Revit Tools
requirements: No experience needed.
courses.description:
Course Description: 18 Essential Tools in Autodesk Revit
Unlock the full potential of Autodesk Revit with our comprehensive course, "18 Essential Tools in Autodesk Revit." Whether you're a beginner or looking to sharpen your skills, this course is designed to guide you through the fundamental tools and techniques necessary to excel in Revit.
What You'll Learn:
Creating Walls: Master the process of constructing walls with precision and ease.
Opening Walls: Learn how to efficiently create openings for doors, windows, and other elements.
Displaying Shadows: Understand how to enhance your models by showing realistic shadows on walls.
Material Creation: Get hands-on experience in creating custom materials to enhance your designs.
Window Design: Discover the steps to add and customize windows in your projects.
Modifying Door Materials: Learn how to change and customize door materials to match your design vision.
And Much More: Explore additional essential tools and techniques that will elevate your Revit skills.
Why Enroll?
This course is meticulously structured to provide you with practical, real-world skills in Revit. Each module focuses on a specific tool or feature, offering step-by-step instructions, expert tips, and hands-on practice. By the end of this course, you'll have a solid foundation in Revit and the confidence to apply these tools in your architectural and design projects.
Who This Course Is For:
Beginners looking to start their journey in Revit
Intermediate users aiming to refine their skills
Professionals in architecture, engineering, and construction seeking to enhance their toolset
Join us and transform your Revit expertise. Enroll now and take the first step towards becoming a Revit pro!

courses.description:
Embarking on the architectural conceptualization phase is a crucial step in shaping the visual and functional identity of a space. This course serves as a guide through this initial stage, where the intricate decisions regarding spatial aesthetics and purposeful design are formulated. Whether crafting a personal haven or responding to the specific requests of clients in a professional capacity, the primary goal is to create designs that seamlessly align with distinct needs and preferences.
In this instructional program, we emphasize a pragmatic approach to the design and conceptualization process, employing accessible tools like Excel. While more sophisticated tools like CAD and Revit exist, they often come with a steep learning curve and significant costs. Excel, on the other hand, provides a user-friendly alternative that requires no advanced skills. This makes the course not only beneficial for architects, draftsmen, and interior designers but also for individuals without formal design backgrounds.
The intention is to demystify the design process, making it approachable for a wider audience. By providing insights and techniques through the lens of Excel, even those unfamiliar with intricate design software can gain an understanding of how to arrange spaces and design them to fulfill specific functions effectively. In essence, this course bridges the gap between design professionals and enthusiasts, fostering a broader appreciation for the art and science of architectural conceptualization.

requirements: Conoscenza base di Photoshop.

courses.description:
Lavori nel campo dell'edilizia o dell'arredo? Allora sicuramente ti sarÃ  capitato di dover usare Photoshop per ritoccare una foto di uno "stato di fatto" per mostrare il risultato del tuo progetto, sia per presentazioni al committente, sia per ottenere permessi dai vari enti. Questo video corso offre una serie di tutorial dedicati alla correzione ed elaborazione di architetture, creazione di varianti cromatiche, ritocco di rendering
Si parte con una carrellata dei vari strumenti di ritocco per sistemare lo stato di fatto: dall'eliminazione di scritte e zone ridotte, al lavoro su aree piÃ¹ ampie con strumenti come Toppa e l'algoritmo in base al contenuto.
Vedrai poi come modificare i colori delle pareti: dell'esterno dell'edificio e dell'interno di una stanza. Con l'uso delle mascherature e dei metodi di fusione, imparerai a modificare colori e carta da parati senza perdere ombre e zone piÃ¹ luminose, per un risultato piÃ¹ realistico delle varie versioni che andai a fare per l'arredo di un soggiorno. Con le composizioni di Livello imparerai a creare varianti in maniera veloce e fluida.
Nella sezione dedicata al foto-inserimento vedrai come inserire un nuovo edificio e come aggiungere verde ed alberi in un fotomontaggio.
Alla fine del videocorso troverai un extra con alcuni aggiornamenti degli strumenti piÃ¹ recenti di Photoshop e una pillola sull'utilizzo del Riempimento Generativo, ossia dell'intelligenza artificiale inclusa all'interno del programma.

à¤à¤¬ AutoCAD à¤¸à¥à¤à¥ à¤µà¥ à¤­à¥ à¤¹à¤¿à¤à¤¦à¥ à¤®à¥à¤ à¤à¤ªà¤à¥ à¤à¤à¤ªà¤¨à¥ à¤­à¤¾à¤·à¤¾ à¤®à¥à¤ à¤¤à¤¾à¤à¤¿ à¤à¤ªà¤à¥ à¤¹à¤° à¤à¤ à¤¬à¤¾à¤¤à¥ à¤¸à¤®à¤ à¤à¤¯à¥ |
Are you frustrated trying to teach yourself AutoCAD?! This course will quickly allow you to start using AutoCAD and getting paid for your AutoCAD skills.
Whether you're brand new to AutoCAD, or have played around with it but need more guidance, this course will help you feel confident and comfortable using the industry-standard CAD application.


This course was designed for the complete beginner, with practice files and a realistic project to allow you to put into practice the skills as you learn them. Throughout this AutoCAD course, you'll be creating your own real-world realistic project that is indicative of the kind you might be asked to create in the workplace. You will learn how to produce a professional drawing to industry standards and hopefully inspire you to do even more!


What will you learn in this AutoCAD Beginners course?
Start by understanding the AutoCAD workspace and tools
Dive into creating your own shapes & lines
Use the modify tools to edit & improve your designs
Advance your skills with professional techniques
Speed up your workflow with the quick selection tool
Learn the difference between Paper Space & Model Space
Work with PDF files and learn to import and edit other peoples designs
Create multiple drawings from the same model using viewport techniques
Get creative with linetypes and hatches
Understand layers and how to use them like a pro
Save, print & export your designs to show others
Become a Professional AutoCAD Drafter
With the skills learned in this course, you'll have a highly-desired skill that can help you get jobs and make money as an AutoCAD Drafter.
AutoCAD is an industry-standard and most widely used application when it comes to CAD software, so it's important for you to learn it if you want to be a professional designer.

El curso consiste en 6 mÃ³dulos, en el mÃ³dulo 1 empezaremos con una breve introducciÃ³n al proyecto, a la metodologÃ­a BIM y a la interfaz de Revit. En el mÃ³dulo 2 aprenderÃ¡s la forma adecuada de crear la topografÃ­a del proyecto, comenzando desde su importaciÃ³n de la referencia de AutoCAD hasta la manera de realizar la terracerÃ­a para emplazar el modelo arquitectÃ³nico. En el mÃ³dulo 3 realizaremos en un archivo distinto la creaciÃ³n del proyecto arquitectÃ³nico, con la finalidad de implementar el concepto de vÃ­nculos entre las disciplinas que abarca Revit. En el modulo 4 haremos una introducciÃ³n al computo de materiales generando tablas de cuantificaciÃ³n. En el mÃ³dulo 5 aprenderemos el renderizado en twinmotion desde su instalaciÃ³n hasta ver y comparar los tipos de render que el software puede realizar, al ser un programa gratuito no tendremos limitaciones. Y en el mÃ³dulo 6 finalmente aprenderemos a editar el modelo para sacar planos arquitectÃ³nicos tÃ©cnicos y a crear y configurar tamaÃ±os de hojas para colocar los planos previamente realizados, diagramaremos las hojas para posteriormente exportar el anteproyecto en PDF y observar resultados.

Al completar este curso, no solo habrÃ¡s adquirido conocimientos tÃ©cnicos en el uso de Revit 2025 y Twinmotion, sino que tambiÃ©n habrÃ¡s desarrollado una visiÃ³n integral del proceso de modelado arquitectÃ³nico, desde la concepciÃ³n hasta la presentaciÃ³n final. Le Masse Concettuali sono un categoria di oggetti di Revit dalle molteplici funzioni ed utilizzi. In questo video tutorial te ne spiego alcuni.
I video sono stati registrati usando la versione Revit 2019 ma se stai usando una versione diversa, va comunque bene, tutte le funzioni, i comandi e soprattutto le procedure, saranno gli stessi ma per la nota mancanza di retro compatibilitÃ  di Revit a versioni precedenti, non potrai perÃ² utilizzare i file Revit giÃ  pronti, messi a tua disposizione e scaricabili.
Il video corso contiene passaggi per la modellazione e parametrizzazione di una Famiglia di Massa caricabile e suggerimenti per la creazione di un'Etichetta intelligente per l'estrazione e la manipolazione dei dati di categoria, per aiutarti nella dimostrazione analitica del calcolo del volume di un fabbricato. Il corso e' stato concepito per progettisti di impianti elettrici ed installatori che si affacciano per la prima volta all'utilizzo di un software di progettazione in ambiente BIM. Il livello del corso e' da considerarsi come "principiante". Il corso si articola in vari tutorial video dove vengono dettagliatamenti illustrate le fasi di settaggio dei parametri di progetto e le procedure per poter facilmente procedere alla redazione dei vari elaborati, layout e tabelle splicative di calcolo.

The Secret of Two Million Minutes of Education Each Year
Emre Timur, a professional architect, author, and educator working in Izmir, is actively engaged in various disciplines such as design, visualization, animation, voiceovers, photography, and more. Emre Timur, who has published seven books, offers training in software like AutoCAD, 3ds Max, V-Ray, Corona, Lumion, Photoshop, Color Design, and Lighting in Film.
1. We are now in the age of speed and urgency. There is no time for lessons that continue like lullabies, especially for educators who fall asleep. I understand the value of your time because mine is precious too.
2. By reviewing the most competent English and Spanish language education available globally, I have strived to establish a global standard of quality, not only for Udemy or Turkish learners. I believe I have achieved this.
3. Most of the education available in the market is like historical relics, antique and outdated. I am constantly trying to improve and update them every day based on feedback and criticism. This is the need of the changing era.
4. I provide quick responses to questions and comments and do not leave any of them unanswered.
5. I aimed to be a good online alternative for traditional education that has become less efficient due to natural disasters like the pandemic or earthquakes. I wanted this place to be an active, lively design school.

courses.title: PRACTICAL KNOWLADGE FOR CIVIL ENGINEERS-SITE ENGINEER
courses.bio: CIVIL ENGINEERING-LAB TEST OF CONSTRUCTION MATERIAL-COPOUN CODE- CIVIL01
requirements: CIVIL ENGINEER
courses.description:
COPOUN CODE--Â  CIVIL01
Site Engineer is one of the Most Searched job in the construction Industry.
But soon after joining the job students get frusted due to Work pressure, less salary and important is they find whatever they have studied in 4 years of Engineering is not useful to them and they donât find itâs Application in their Job.


This Course has been Made Keeping all these Things in Mind where Students will be able to apply their Engineering Knowledge Learnt in the Classroom into the Construction Industry as An Site Engineer.
This Course Bridges the Gap between the College Education & the Industry Demands


Mode of Teaching: PPT, Live Site Photos, Live Site Videos, Excel Sheets & Structural Drawings
Course Contents:


Learn Complete Building Execution from Site Clearance â Centre Line Marking â PCC â Foundation Shuttering â Foundation Concreting â Column Shuttering â Column Concreting â Beam Concreting â Slab Centring â Slab Concreting - Complete Interiors from Brickwork â Block work â Plastering â Painting - Quality Check List â IS Code Books like IS 456-2000 , IS 875 âPart 1, 2, 3 , 4, 5 , IS 1893-2016 , IS 13920 -2016 , IS 10262-2019


The Learners will understand to Read all Architectural and structural Auto cad Drawings
The Learners will understand how a building is constructed from Scratch with Practical Photos + Videos
The learners will understand the Basics of Civil Engineering and also about Structural Engineering
In this course students will be able to learn construction sequence & its practical application at site.

O aluno aprenderÃ¡ a elaborar o seu prÃ³prio template com os conhecimentos adquiridos neste treinamento, pois iniciaremos o projeto utilizando um template padrÃ£o do Autodesk Revit, e ao final do curso, teremos um template no padrÃ£o Prefeitura.

courses.title: V-Ray 6 + 3ds Max: Master 3D Rendering with Vray & 3ds Max
courses.bio: 3ds Max & V-Ray: create and render an exterior scene
requirements: You will need 3ds Max and the V-Ray rendering software to follow along.
Basic 3Ds Max knowledge
courses.description:
Do you want to create your own photorealistic renderings?
This V-ray in 3ds Max course will teach you to create beautiful photorealistic renderings to visually engage your clients. From camera position and lighting, to adding materials, merging objects and creating stunning imagery. In this course, we are going to share the workflow we use to create photorealistic renders. We are hoping that youâll grow to enjoy this process as much as we do!
We have used 3ds Max 2023 and vray 6 through the course.
We will be sharing the 3ds Max models so that you can follow along.


Throughout the course, we generally approached problems from the point of view of a 3D Artist. However in some cases we found it more practical to approach things like a photographer. This combination of approaches helps us understand and solve problems very effectively.


Enroll now and get instant access to:
1.20 hours of easy-to-watch video lessons
Downloadable project files to follow along with
Instructor support if you have questions
Lifetime access to course updates
About the Instructor
hamid mohseni is a expert 3d artist.
As a 3D Artist, he is an expert with 10 years of experience in 3D Modeling, 3D Sculpting and 3D Rendering. He worked on creating various of graphical content including interior and exterior renders.
As a teacher, he shared his passion and experiences to teach how to use 3ds Max, V-Ray and Corona Render in universities and private institutes. His experiences in solving many type of problems with tight deadlines allows him to impart a practical understanding of his craft.

01 STEP 3.2 IMPORTING PROJECT 1 TO AFTER EFFECTS_1
01 STEP 3.3 CREATE SHAPES FROM VECTOR LAYER (AFTER EFFECTS)
Project 03: 03 STEP 1 Box Reveal and Height Line Dimension Animation

requirements: Start from scratch, no need for previous knowledge for the programs used in this course
courses.description:
Animate Your Architectural Vision: Master the Art of Storytelling Through Motion
In "Conceptual Architecture in Motion," you'll unlock a powerful new dimension in architectural visualization. Learn to transform your designs into captivating animations that leave a lasting impression on clients and academics alike. This course will empower you to tell compelling stories through movement effects, breathing life into your concepts like never before.
Using a dynamic combination of SketchUp, Illustrator, and After Effects, you'll master the art of creating immersive architectural animations. I'll guide you step-by-step through the entire process:
Conceptual Modeling in SketchUp: Learn to build 3D models specifically optimized for animation, focusing on key elements and efficient workflows.
Visual Enhancement in Illustrator: Discover how to refine your visuals, create stylized graphics, and develop a unique aesthetic for your animation.
Animation and Storytelling in After Effects: Master the art of bringing your models to life with camera movements, object animations, and compelling transitions. Explore techniques for conveying narrative and evoking emotion through motion.
Crafting a Cohesive Vision: Learn to combine all the elements into a polished final animation that effectively communicates your design intent and captivates your audience.
Whether you're a student looking to stand out from the crowd, an architect seeking to elevate your presentations, or a designer eager to explore new creative avenues, this course provides the skills and knowledge to unlock the full potential of animation in architectural visualization. Join us and discover a new world of dynamic architectural storytelling!

ATTENTION: THE PRIMARY LANGUAGE OF INSTRUCTION FOR THIS COURSE IS TURKISH. ENGLISH SUBTITLES ARE PROVIDED.
You create great designs and you've mastered the latest software... But how do you turn those skills into a professional identity that will land you your dream job? Your CV and portfolio speak before you do, and you don't get a second chance to make a first impression.
This course offers a strategy on how to market yourself as a designer effectively.
What You Will Learn Step-by-Step:
Effective CV Strategies: How to create a modern, professional CV that grabs attention in seconds.
Impactful Portfolio Design: How to turn your work into a compelling story that showcases your design vision and competence.
Job Interview Tactics: How to confidently answer common interview questions and present yourself professionally.
Career Planning & Self-Development: How to continuously educate yourself and stand out in the industry.
This course is the final and most critical step in turning your technical skills into a tangible career. It's the capstone of our 8-Week Portfolio Camp, making you "job-ready." Taught by a practicing architect with 15 years of experience, this course provides practical advice tailored specifically for the design industry. Ideal for architecture and design students, new graduates, and young professionals looking to build a powerful professional identity.

You've modeled a great kitchen, so what's next? How do you turn that detailed model into a breathtaking visual that will impress your clients or employers?
This is the second and final part of our Kitchen Design series, focusing exclusively on professional visualization. courses.description:
El objetivo del curso es que el estudiante pueda elaborar Certificados EnergÃ©ticos de Edificios y verificar el cumplimiento del CÃ³digo TÃ©cnico de la EdificaciÃ³n en sus apartados de Ahorro EnergÃ©tico con el programa informÃ¡tico Herramienta Unificada Lider Calener (conocido como HULC). Este programa ha sido promovido por el Gobierno espaÃ±ol y se distribuye gratuitamente.
El curso es en lÃ­nea y se basa en el visionado de vÃ­deos. Se proponen ejercicios a realizar por el alumno y se pueden realizar consultas al autor del curso. Una vez inscrito, el acceso es para siempre, por lo que el alumno lo puede hacer a su ritmo y una vez finalizado se puede utilizar como material de consulta.
EstÃ¡ dirigido a arquitectos, ingenieros y tÃ©cnicos en general, tanto si no tienen conocimiento de HULC como si ya saben usarlo pero quieren mejorar en su manejo.
AdemÃ¡s de explicar el mÃ©todo a seguir para elaborar los modelos de edificios, tambiÃ©n se tratarÃ¡ sobre cÃ³mo proceder para optimizar el comportamiento energÃ©tico de Ã©ste, cumplir la normativa y mejorar de la calificaciÃ³n energÃ©tica.
Se desarrolla de forma completa la aplicaciÃ³n a un edificio plurifamiliar de 14 viviendas con garaje, con una tipologÃ­a que puede abarcar muchos casos frecuentes (cubierta inclinada y plana, con otro edificio anexo, local comercial etc.). TambiÃ©n tendrÃ¡s herramientas para freelance/marca propia: colecciÃ³n cÃ¡psula, piezas a medida y colaboraciÃ³n con carpinterÃ­as y metalisterÃ­as, gestionando proveedores, costes, packaging y ficha tÃ©cnica para producciÃ³n real.


Dirigido a
Estudiantes y profesionales de diseÃ±o, arquitectura e interiorismo; makers, carpinteros, metalistas y perfiles creativos que deseen pasar de la idea a la pieza fabricada. Ideal para quien busca portafolio potente, mÃ©todo claro y plantillas listas para usar, empezando desde cero y escalando hasta un nivel profesional.


MetodologÃ­a de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vÃ­deo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artÃ­culos didÃ¡cticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interÃ©s, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalizaciÃ³n, tutorizaciÃ³n online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicaciÃ³n del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tÃº quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase segÃºn tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al mÃ¡ximo la formaciÃ³n, pero tambiÃ©n puedes decidir ver este curso como una guÃ­a de referencia.
Las clases estÃ¡n claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten mÃ¡s importantes segÃºn tus necesidades formativas. La mayorÃ­a de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lecciÃ³n sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formaciÃ³n se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso estÃ¡ orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer mÃºltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Ãlvaro GarcÃ­a y LucÃ­a FernÃ¡ndez. AdemÃ¡s la formaciÃ³n disponen de acceso automÃ¡tico al contenido, sin limitaciÃ³n de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al dÃ­a los 7 dÃ­as de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantÃ­a de devoluciÃ³n.
Con esta formaciÃ³n disfrutarÃ¡s aprendiendo desde dÃ³nde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quiÃ©n quieras, segÃºn tus necesidades y disponibilidad. AprenderÃ¡s con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). ConocerÃ¡s las tÃ©cnicas, mÃ©todos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirÃ¡ su sabidurÃ­a y conocimientos con pasiÃ³n a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. PodrÃ¡s conseguir unÂ  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formaciÃ³n. De estÃ¡ forma podrÃ¡s compartir tu tÃ­tulo en tu portafolio, currÃ­culo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definiciÃ³n de los vÃ­deos (vÃ­deo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirÃ¡ no te perder detalle. PodrÃ¡s ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseÃ±ador. TendrÃ¡s la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opiniÃ³n y ayuda al instructor, ademÃ¡s de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demÃ¡s alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tÃº, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la mÃ¡xima calidad.


Â¿A quÃ© esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrÃ©vete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formaciÃ³n ;)

Fabricantes y estudios que quieren optimizar tolerancias, QA/QC y procesos para series cortas o colecciÃ³n cÃ¡psula.

courses.title: Kursus Autocad 2 Dimensi lengkap dengan trik cepat
courses.bio: Kamu baru belajar autocad dan mencoba belajar sendiri tapi belum bisa-bisa?
objectives: Pengenalan pertama Mengganti layar kerja, percepat kinerja autocad, ubah pixbox, ubah unit, pengenalan tool-tool.

Pengenalan tool Ribbon layer, annotation, block, group
Menggambar denah: Membuat garis As Dengan line, polyline atau rectangle
Membuat Ukuran atau Dimensi, Setting dimensi, Mengatur Layer
Dinding plesteran dan Membuat dinding bata
Menambahkan teras dan Arsir dinding bata
Menambahkan block furniture (design center & dynamic block)
Membuat keterangan teks, Perintah: Multiline, single line
Menggambar elevation tampak: Tampak depan Dengan perintah: copy, rotate, construction line, line, trim, dll
Menggambar Section potongan: Potongan membujur (potongan-A) Dengan perintah: copy, rotate, construction line,
Membuat Kop nama atau kepala gambar: Print skala pada kop nama dg viewport
Tugas Praktek: Membuat Design Rumah tinggal sederhana dengan Autocad 2D

requirements: Tidak ada syarat, yang penting bisa mengoperasikan komputer dasar
courses.description:
Coba belajar dari youtube, tapi gak nemu yang terstruktur materinya?
Udah coba beli buku, tapi belum juga berhasil?
Mau ikut kursus tapi di kotamu gak ada yang ngadain, apa lagi di masa pandemi sekarangâ¦
Yukâ¦belajar di Udemy aja..
Kursus online AutoCAD merupakan pendidikan yang mempelajari sebuah perangkat lunak komputer CAD (Computer Aided Design) yang digunakan untuk membuat gambar 2 dimensi dan 3 dimensi.
Perangkat lunak ini dikembangkan oleh Autodesk dan berguna bagi kebanyakan orang dengan profesi seperti land developers, insinyur sipil, insinyur mesin, arsitek, interior designer, dan lain-lain.
Namun, ada kalanya orang-orang dengan profesi selain yang disebutkan di atas ingin menguasai pengoperasian AutoCAD.
TUJUAN PEMBELAJARAN Peserta mampu mengoperasikan autocad 2D beserta tool dan perintah-perintah penting yang ada didalam autocad dengan baik. Dan mampu menerapkan untuk membuat gambar kerja secara detail.
Beberapa topik materi yang akan kita bahas adalah :
- Bagian ke-1 :
Pengenalan pertama : Pengoperasian Mouse, keyboard dan Setting autocad
Pengenalan kedua : Menu dan Ribbon
Pengenalan ketiga : Tool footer
- Bagian ke-2:
Praktek menggambar yang lebih komplek yaitu membuat proyek Rumah tinggal, mulai dari membuat denah
- Bagian ke-3:
Membuat gambar tampak
- Bagian ke-4 :
Membuat gambar potongan
- Bagian ke-5:
Membuat gambar kerja (gambar detail).
- Lalu pada akhir materi , saya akan mengajak Anda untuk belajar Membuat kop nama, cara skala, export PDF dan cetak gambar
target_audience: Untuk umum, lulusan SMA, SMP, Kuliah, Pekerja, Swasta, Karyawan, dan siapa saja yang ingin belajar autocad

Autodesk Revit es un software de Modelado de informaciÃ³n de construcciÃ³n (BIM, Building Information Modeling) , para Microsoft Windows, desarrollado actualmente por Autodesk, que permite al usuario diseÃ±ar con elementos de modelaciÃ³n, dibujo paramÃ©trico y planificar proyectos mediante tablas de planificaciÃ³n.


" Revit Arquitectura / Curso avanzado" es un curso desarrollado totalmente para arquitectos y ingenieros que quieren dar un salto de la metodologÃ­a CAD a la metodologÃ­a BIM.

Aprenderemos a diseÃ±ar, modelar y cuantificar nuestro proyecto durante el curso, al mismo, conocer las distintas formas de presentarlo de manera arquitectÃ³nico elaborando planos de plantas, elevaciones, secciones y perspectivas.
La versiÃ³n 2022 del programa es la versiÃ³n que se estarÃ¡ utilizandoÂ  para el desarrollo del proyecto,Â  y que tambiÃ©n puede ser aplicable el uso de una versiÃ³n anterior, empezando desde el 2017 hacia adelante.

Al finalizar el curso, habrÃ¡s de aprender como modelar, construir y cuantificar de manera sencilla los proyectos constructivos que se construye en la realidad con el programa Revit, y al mismo, recibir un certificado de finalizaciÃ³n de Udemy, acertando las horas cursadas y los conocimientos adquirido con respecto al tema.

requirements: No Prior Experience Required
courses.description:
Welcome to Learning & Exploring Civil Engineering Concepts & Softwares Practically.
Autodesk Revit is a building information modelling software tool for architects, landscape architects, structural engineers, mechanical, electrical, and plumbing (MEP) engineers, designers and contractors. The software allows users to design a building and structure and its components in 3D, annotate the model with 2D drafting elements, and access building information from the building model's database. Revit is 4D building information modeling application capable with tools to plan and track various stages in the building's lifecycle, from concept to construction and later maintenance and/or demolition.
Take your Revit skills to the Advanced level. First, get comfortable with the Revit environment, and learn to set up a project and add the grids, levels, and dimensions that will anchor your design. Then we dive into modeling: adding walls, doors, and windows; creating and mirroring groups; linking to DWG files; and working with floors, roofs, and ceilings. I will also shows advanced techniques for modeling stairs and complex walls, adding rooms, and creating schedules. Finally, discover how to annotate your drawing so all the components are perfectly understood, and learn how to output sheets to PDF and AutoCAD.
Finally i will also covers basics to Intermediate level of dynamo in Revit.
This course is going to be constantly updated. So once you purchase the course you will get updated sessions, with Q & A.
Herewith I had created many videos for civil engineering students & professionals in order to learn concepts & softwares practically.
In this Course you can learn following most demanded civil engineering softwares from very basic level to advanced level.
AutoCAD 2D
AutoCAD 3D,
Revit Architecture,
Revit Structure,
Revit MEP
Revit Dynamo,
Staad Pro,
Etabs,
Revit to Lumion Pro,
Preliminary Designs of Structural Members,
Leaning Bar Bending Schedule with AutoCAD & Excel,
Quantity Surveying / Building Estimation with AutoCAD & Excel,
AutoCAD Raster Design,
Introduction to ISO Global BIM Standards


With Warm Regards,
Ashish Pandit
B.E. Civil Engineering From M.S. University (First Class with Distinction) (BIM Engineer)

requirements: Ã consigliata una minima conoscenza del software Revit, anche se non essenziale in quanto cercheremo di trattare ogni comando quando verrÃ  il momento di usarlo. CosÃ¬ l'apprendimento sarÃ  molto piÃ¹ rapido. Le informazioni dei comandi verranno dati all'occorrenza per evitare di bombardarti ore ed ore su interfacce e tasti. La migliore comprensione avviene svolgendo il lavoro.

Per utilizzare i file RVT allegati Ã¨ necessario utilizzare Revit dalla versione 2024 in poi. Se utilizzi una versione meno recente non preoccuparti: tutte le lezioni spiegano, di volta in volta, come ottenere i risultati attesi. Il materiale didattico passerÃ  in secondo piano.
Ã consigliata una minima conoscenza dei software di computazione.
courses.description:
Sono soddisfatto di presentarti il corso piÃ¹ pratico ed immediato che ci sia in Italia. Ci ho lavorato nei ritagli di tempo (che tanto ritagli non sono stati). Ho spostato appuntamenti di lavoro, ho registrato di notte, nei weekend e sotto le festivitÃ  natalizie: tutto per riuscire a creare un corso che contenesse tutto l'essenziale per chi si affaccia per la prima volta su Revit, per chi Ã¨ esperto di Revit e vuole confrontare le proprie abilitÃ  o scoprire come vengono affrontati alcuni temi in modo differente; si rivolge a chi si affaccia per la prima volta nel mondo della libera professione e a chi, magari piÃ¹ esperto, vuole approfondire determinate tematiche.
Dieci anni fa, avessi avuto io un corso cosÃ¬ completo sulle piÃ¹ svariate tematiche della vita progettuale e professionale (dalla fattibilitÃ  all'esecutivo, passando per i primi dati di potenziali costi dell'opera, attraversando il progetto preliminare con lo sviluppo del computo metrico estimativo, al progetto definitivo e la consegna degli elaborati all'ente comunale fino ad arrivare all'esecutivo da cantiere) non ci avrei pensato due volte a vederlo tutto di un fiato. Molte cose le ho apprese con il tempo e con gli errori. Molti errori.
Proprio per questo motivo ho deciso di dedicare una gran fetta delle mie ore giornaliere su questo corso.
Che tu sia un Architetto, un Ingegnere o un Geometra: il mio intento Ã¨ farti capire il processo di un nuovo incarico professionale: dall'impianto base fino all'esecutivo. Quando ho iniziato la professione ho trovato tante difficoltÃ  nell'affrontare, da solo, un progetto. Mi domandavo sempre:


come faccio a sapere come e quanto costruire, quale normativa seguire?
quali sono e quanti sono i documenti da rappresentare?
come stimare il costo di un fabbricato nella fase di prefattibilitÃ ?
come si sviluppa un computo metrico estimativo?
come devo impaginare per rendere di facile lettura le tavole per l'ente comunale?
cosa devo rappresentare come esecutivo da girare all'impresa per il cantiere?
come si scrive una relazione tecnica?
In teoria tutti siamo bravi grazie ai vari manuali ma nella pratica Ã¨ stato duro scontrarsi senza un tutor che mi accompagnasse in ogni passo.
Inoltre spero di poter essere di aiuto a futuri professionisti, giovani o meno giovani, che sono scoraggiati da come affrontare un incarico piÃ¹ o meno complesso mentre si stanno affacciando per la prima volta nel mondo della libera professione.

Con questo corso, che ha richiesto piÃ¹ di quattro mesi di registrazione e altri due mesi di sola preparazione, avrai solide fondamenta per innalzare il tuo impalcato professionale. Capirai il funzionamento del programma e di molti meccanismi collegati alla professione. Ricorda: Revit Ã¨ uno strumento nelle tue mani. Devi essere veloce, immediato e diretto per poter affrontare la concorrenza e rendere un servizio di alta qualitÃ .
Ti sei mai chiesto perchÃ© dei potenziali Clienti dovrebbero scegliere te invece di un altro professionista?Â Grazie a questo corso imparerai ad essere efficiente, veloce, professionale, preciso nei dati perchÃ© sfrutterai la potenza di un software B.I.M. nel modo piÃ¹ intuitivo e veloce possibile che gioverÃ  sia alla tua attivitÃ  che ai tuoi Clienti andando ad abbattere costi e problematiche burocratiche e di cantiere.
target_audience: Neo laureati pronti ad avviare il proprio business utilizzando Revit.
Neo professionisti che vogliono capire come funziona il mondo dell'edilizia, utilizzando i software piÃ¹ innovativi.
Liberi professionisti che hanno deciso di lasciare i vecchi strumenti di progettazione per abbracciare le nuove tecnologie.
Architetti, Ingegneri e Geometri che hanno deciso di intraprendere la carriera da libero professionista e vogliono iniziare da subito ad essere competitivi.

courses.title: AutoCAD Tutorials For Architects & Interior Designers
courses.bio: This is the only course you will ever need to learn AutoCAD right from zero to hero.
objectives: AutoCAD Advance Tutorials With All Settings
Learn How To Work & Draft Fast & Fastest
How To Work Like A Professional Level

AutoCAD User Interface & Important Setti: Getting Knowledge of Everything About AutoCAD Before Start Anything

Basic to Advance Way to Use Table Tool,: How to Make & Use Table, Blocks & Group tools

requirements: No Prior Knowledge of AutoCAD required. Just Install AutoCAD in your System & you are ready to go.
courses.description:
What is this course all about?
This course is a full-length AutoCAD 2018, 19, 20, 21, and 2022 learning package which contains almost all of the topics that every architect, civil engineer, and Interior Designer needs to work with this software. The course is designed for beginners.
A beginner can start learning the software right from scratch by following the course along just from lecture one. With the skills learned in this course, you'll have a highly-desired skill that can help you get jobs and make money as an AutoCAD Drafter too.
AutoCAD is an industry-standard and most widely used application when it comes to CAD software, so it's important for you to learn it if you want to be a professional designer.


Course Topics
Interface: Start Tab, Templates, Application Menu, Quick Access Toolbar, InfoCentre, Layout Tabs, Status Bar, Options, Mouse controls, Navigation, Object Selection,
Drawing Tools: Line, Polyline, Circle, Rectangle, Polygon, Ellipse, Hatch, Gradient, Spline, Object Snap
Drawing Methods: Absolute & Relative Coordinates, Orthomode, Grid & Snap, Polar Tracking
Modification Tools: Move, Copy, Stretch, Rotate, Mirror, Scale, Trim, Extend, Fillet, Chamfer, Array, Erase, Explode, Offset, Align, Join,
Annotation: Text, Dimension, Leader, create own styles
Layers: Colour Manager, Linetype Manager, Lineweight Manager, Creation, properties, application, functions
Blocks: Create, Edit, Insert, Design Centre
Palettes: Properties, Blocks, Layers, Command-Line, Design Centre
Layout: Viewports, Page Setups, Printing
target_audience: Who want to work like a professional and want to learn the advance topics about AutoCAD then this course is definitely for you.
Everyone who want to learn Advance AutoCAD

courses.title: The Complete AutoCAD Architectural 2D & 3D in Hindi/Urdu

objectives: Work efficiently with AutoCAD.

requirements: As such basics of computer operating is all what the students required to know.
courses.description:
What is this course all about?
This course covers AutoCAD 2022 in complete detail. This course is equally good for AutoCAD 2013 and later versions.
Why a new course?
Although there are already plenty of AutoCAD courses most of them lack a few basic things which this course fulfills like
A complete explanation of commands and sub-commands
Example-based lectures for each command
Showing the application of commands in real-life scenarios of designing and drafting
Use of actual engineering drawings as data files
Lectures about advanced topics like dynamic blocks and sheet sets included
Prepare technical drawings with AutoCAD utilizing the tools of Draw, Modify, and Dimension toolbars.
Create and draw a basic 2D drawing in AutoCAD and its usage in planning and designing housing schemes.
Use the basic functions and features of CAD 3D design.
Design using AutoCAD commands with the help of shortcut keyboard keys.
Export and present AutoCAD data into other formats like (PDF, JPEG, etc.)
Design the layout of the drawing and understand the printing and plotting features.
Who this course is for:
This course is for students who have little or no knowledge of AutoCAD
Students who want to make a career in engineering design
Students of Architecture
Students who want to learn a CAD package for their own or professional use.
AutoCAD is an emerging field that combines creativity with technical skills. This course will help a trainee to acquire a basic introduction to Computer-Aided Design (CAD). AutoCAD is the pioneer software in leaving behind the cumbersome ways of drawing on a sheet/paper by hand to CAD designing with a technical approach. This course will help you learn this software step by step from beginner to professional level. The goal is to develop planning and designing skills starting with the fundamental theory and practice of AutoCAD and quickly advancing to draw Polylines, fillets, chamfering, gradient, layers and hatching, etc. 3D CAD introduction and modeling will also be discussed in collaboration with AutoCAD software. This course puts you on the track of accomplishment by providing complete instructions on how to start your AutoCAD career as a freelancer and get the best AutoCAD jobs.
Who is Author?
Shaour anjum has a Civil Engineer from Punjab School of Mines PBT Lahore,
He is an expert AutoCAD trainer and has great exposure to AutoCAD projects including Planning and Designing buildings, housing schemes, and 3D modeling in AutoCAD. He is also conducting various workshops on different software in Shahid Computer Academy. An experienced teacher and guiding professional who gives tips related to AutoCAD and other designing software to undergraduate students.
target_audience: This course is for students who have little or no knowledge of AutoCAD.
Students who want to make a career in architectural & engineering design.
Students who want to learn a CAD package for their own or professional use.

En este curso vamos a ver como crear un flujo de trabajo entre los softwares Autodesk REVIT y Autodesk AutoCAD, sumando otros softwares de visualizaciÃ³n y control de proyectos, gratuitos que tiene Autodesk.
Â¿Trabajas en Revit pero tus compaÃ±eros no?

El objetivo del curso es mostrar cÃ³mo se puede trabajar de manera colaborativa entre estos programas y por lo tanto entre diferentes profesionales o encargados de diferentes tareas dentro de un proyecto de construcciÃ³n. Al ser el objetivo principal crear este flujo de trabajo para un proyecto, el curso estÃ¡ dirigido a cualquier persona que ocupe cualquier cargo en la realizaciÃ³n de un proyecto, ya que al finalizar el curso entenderÃ¡ y podrÃ¡ manejar las diferentes herramientas para exportar, importar y visualizar un archivo (.rvt .dwg .dwf.), como para generar anotaciones o revisiones.
